S04bsu016_u:413: tatkasya hetoḥ? abhijātabodhisattvacakṣuṣpathavijñeyaṃ hi tat, na śrāvakacakṣuṣpathavijñeyam /
S04bsu016_u:414: tena te mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane sthitāstāni tathāgatavikurvitāni buddhādhiṣṭhānāni buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ na paśyanti //

S04bsu016_u:415_2: kākasaṃghopadrutāni vṛkaśṛgālairvitrāsyamānāni tāṃ gaṅgāṃ mahānadīṃ na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:416: kecitpunaḥ śuṣkāṃ paśyanti nirudakāṃ bhasmaparipūrṇām, āvaraṇīyakarmāvṛtatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:417: evameva te sthavirā mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane sthitāḥ tāni tathāgatavikurvitāni na paśyanti,
S04bsu016_u:421: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo mahatyahni vartamāne mahato janakāyasya madhye styānamiddhamavakrāmet /
S04bsu016_u:422: sa suptaḥ svapnāntaragatastatraiva pradeśe devanagaraṃ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:423: sudarśanacakranilayaṃ sarvaṃ ca sumerutalaṃ savṛkṣaṃ sodyānamaṇḍalamapsaraḥkoṭīniyutaśatasahasrākīrṇaṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrādhyuṣitaṃ vicitradivyapuṣpābhikīrṇam /
S04bsu016_u:430: sa ca sarvo janakāyo na paśyet, na jānīyāt, na vilokayet, tatraiva pradeśe sthitaḥ san /
S04bsu016_u:433: tatraiva ca pradeśe sthitasya tasya mahājanakāyasyādarśanam /
S04bsu016_u:434_0: evameva te bodhisattvāste ca lokendrā bodhyabhimukhā vipulena buddhādhiṣṭhānena svakuśalamūlasusamārjitatayā
S04bsu016_u:436: te ca mahāśrāvakā agrayugabhadrayugapramukhā na paśyanti na jānanti bodhisattvacakṣurvirahitatvāt //
S04bsu016_u:437: tadyathāpi nāma himavati parvatarāje auṣadhyākarākīrṇe mantravidyauṣadhijñānagrahaṇasiddhavidyaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvauṣadhividhīn prajānan auṣadhigrahaṇakarma kuryāt /
S04bsu016_u:438: tatraiva ca śailendrābhirūḍhāḥ paśugaveḍakaṛkṣamṛgalubdhakāstadanye vā punarauṣadhyavidhijñāḥ puruṣāstamauṣadhirasavīryavipākaprabhāvopāyayogaṃ na prajānanti /
S04bsu016_u:439: evemeva te bodhisattvāstathāgatajñānaviṣayamavatīrṇā bodhisattvavikurvitaviṣayananiryātāstaṃ tathāgatasamādhivikurvitaviṣayaṃ prajānanti,
S04bsu016_u:440: te ca mahāśrāvakāagrayugabhadrayugapramukhāstatraiva jetavane viharantaḥ svakāryasaṃtuṣṭāḥ parakāryanirutsukā upekṣakā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāreṇa sukhasparśaṃ viharanti,
S04bsu016_u:442: tadyathāpi nāma iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī sarvaratnākarasamṛddhā nidhiśatasahasranicitā nānāvidhānantaratnaparipūrṇā /
S04bsu016_u:443_1: vipulapuṇyabalopastabdhaḥ tato yatheṣṭaṃ ratnānyādāaya ātmānaṃ samyak prīṇayet,
S04bsu016_u:446: tadanyeṣāmapi sattvānāṃ vṛddhānāmāturāṇāṃ daridrāṇāṃ vinipatitānāmaśanavasanaviprahīṇānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt /
S04bsu016_u:453: evaṃ te bodhisattvā jetavane tatra acintye tathāgataviṣaye supariśuddhajñānacakṣuṣo 'cintyatathāgatajñānaviṣayāvatīrṇāstāni buddhavikurvitāni paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:459: te ca mahāśrāvakāstāni tathāgatavikurvitāni taṃ ca mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇasaṃnipātaṃ na paśyanti na jānanti //
S04bsu016_u:460: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo dūṣyavastrābaddhābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ ratnadvīpamanuprāptaḥ syāt /
S04bsu016_u:461: sa tatra ratnadvīpe caṃkramet, tiṣṭhet, niṣīdet, śayyāṃ vā kalpayet, na ca taṃ ratnākaraṃ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:462: na ratnavṛkṣān, na vastraratnāni, na gandharatnāni, na sarvaratnāni paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:463: nāpi tāni ratnāni parijānīyādviṣayato vā mūlyato vā paribhogato va /
S04bsu016_u:464: sa tāni ratnāni na parigṛhṇīyāt, na ca ratnakāryamanubhavet /
S04bsu016_u:466_0: evameva te bodhisattvā dharmaratnadvīpamanuprāptā anuttaraṃ tathāgataratnaṃ sarvalokālaṃkāraṃ
S04bsu016_u:466_1: saṃmukhībhūtaṃ jetavane sthitamacintyāni [Gv_16] buddhavikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānaṃ paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:467: te ca mahāśrāvakāstatraiva bhagavataḥ pādamūle tiṣṭhanti yāpayanti,
S04bsu016_u:469: na ca taṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvasaṃnipātaṃ mahāratnākaram /
S04bsu016_u:474: tadyathāpi nāma asti virajaḥprabhāsavatī nāma cakṣuḥpariśuddhiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:482: na ca te manuṣyāstaṃ puruṣaṃ paśyeyuḥ, na saṃjānīyuḥ vividhānīryāpathān kalpayamānam /
S04bsu016_u:483: sa ca puruṣastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ paśyet nāneryāpathākalpavihāriṇaṃ nānādigabhimukhaṃ nānāsaṃsthānaṃ nānāvarṇaṃ nānāprāvaraṇam /
S04bsu016_u:484: evemeva tathāgataḥ sabodhisattvagaṇaparivāro viśuddhāsaṅgajñānacakṣuḥ sarvalokaṃ jānāti paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:488: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣurmahato janakāyasya madhye pṛthivīkṛtsnaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyeta,
S04bsu016_u:501: na ca taṃ jvalanālokaṃ na ca tadvividhakāyakṛtsnam yāvat taṃ sarvālambanakṛtsnaṃ na paśyet,
S04bsu016_u:503: evameva tathāgatasya tadacintyabuddhasamādhiviṣayavikurvitaṃ saṃdarśayataḥ ye mahāśrāvakā na paśyanti,
S04bsu016_u:505: tadyathāpi nāma añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣo netrayorañjitamātrayoḥ sarvajanakāyenādṛśyaśarīro bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:506: sa gacchan vā sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā sarvajanakāyaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:509: te ca mahāśrāvakāstāni tathāgatavikurvitāni na paśyanti //
S04bsu016_u:510: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣasya sahajātā devatā nityānubaddhā /
S04bsu016_u:511: sā taṃ puruṣaṃ paśyati, sa ca puruṣastāṃ devatāṃ na paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:512: evameva tathāgataḥ sarvajñajñānaviṣayāvasthito mahānti buddhavikurvitāni saṃdarśayati mahato bodhisattvagaṇasaṃnipātasya madhye /
S04bsu016_u:513: te ca mahāśrāvakāstaṃ tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ tacca bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalavikurvitaṃ na paśyanti na jānanti //
S04bsu016_u:515: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣuḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanno na saṃjānāti na vedayati,
S04bsu016_u:519: na ca tān saṃjānāti, na vedayati yaduta tasyā eva samāpatteradhiṣṭhānādhipatyena /
S04bsu016_u:526: na ca taṃ mahābodhisattvasaṃnipātam bodhisattvaprātihāryaṃ bodhisattvavikurvitamavataranti,
S04bsu016_u:529: gambhīro hi buddhaviṣayo vipulo 'prameyo durdṛśo duṣpratibodho duravagāhaḥ sarvalokasamatikrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:531: tena te mahāśrāvakāstatraiva jetavane bhagavataḥ pādamūlagatāstāni buddhavikurvitāni na paśyanti /
S04bsu016_u:532: taṃ ca mahābodhisattvasaṃnipātam tacca jetavanamacintyāsaṃkhyeyaviśuddhalokadhātuguṇavyūhasamavasaraṇaṃ na paśyanti na jānanti yathāpi tadabhājanībhūtatvāt //
S04bsu016_u:533: atha khalu vairocanapraṇidhānābhiraścimaprabho bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:539: pravartate prātihāryaṃ yatra loko na gāhate // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:541: alakṣaṇā hi te dharmā ye saṃbuddhaiḥ prabhāvitāḥ // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:549: na prajānanti te caryāṃ na caiṣāṃ cittagocaram // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:555: atha khalu duryodhanavīryavegarājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:576: atha khalu samantaśrīsamudgatatejorājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:582: na ca pradeśa saṃbuddho na ca buddho diśānugaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:592: yathā hi pṛthivī loke pratiṣṭhā sarvadehinām /
S04bsu016_u:598: atha khalu asaṅgaśrīgarbharājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:620: atha khalu dharmadhātupraṇidhisunirmitacandrarājo bodhisattvo buddhadhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:641: atha khalu dharmārciṣmattejorājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:647: kiṃ punaḥ sarvasattvā hi vijñāsyanti vināyakam /
S04bsu016_u:657: yeṣāṃ ca praṇidhistatra yeṣāṃ ca manaso ratiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:663: atha khalu sarvamāramaṇḍalavikiraṇajñānadhvajarājo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:677: śakyaṃ na jñānaparyanto gantuṃ buddhasya kenacit /
S04bsu016_u:682: cittamityapi yatrāsya citte cittaṃ na jāyate // 69 //
S04bsu016_u:685: atha khalu vairocanapraṇidhānaketudhvajo bodhisattvo buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:690: khedo notpadyate teṣāṃ na teṣāṃ sīdate manaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:696: vicaranti ca saṃsāre na ca saṃsāraniśritāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:1120: śrutvā ca punarupāsakopāsikā dārakadārikā mahāprajñopāsakaśreṣṭhipūrvaṃgamāḥ pratyekaṃ pañcaśataparivārā dhanyākarānnagarānniṣkramya yena mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:1123_4: pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat //

S04bsu016_u:2675: te vayaṃ saṃvegajātāḥ saparivārāḥ etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāma /
S04bsu016_u:2677: yathā svacittapratilabdhā bodhāya cittamutpādya avinivartanīyā bhavāmo 'nuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S04bsu016_u:2678: daśa ca vaśavartidevarājasahasrāṇi divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ - vayaṃ kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:2679: asya pañcatapastapyataḥ svabhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2683_1: pūjāṃ kṛtvā evamāhuḥ - etasya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhyastadrūpā prabhā niścarati,
S04bsu016_u:2689: vayamapīdānīṃ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārā na kāmeṣu ratiṃ vindāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2694: daśa ca saṃtuṣitadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsaragaṇoparivārāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā sarvagandhacūrṇameghavarṣamabhipravṛṣya pūjayitvā namaskṛtya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:2698: saṃtuṣṭicittatāyai cittaparituṣṭitāyai kuśalamūlasaṃjananatāyai bodhicittotpādapratilābhāya yāvatsarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dharmaṃ deśayati //
S04bsu016_u:2699_0: daśa ca suyāmadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārāṇi divyāni māndāravakusumavarṣāṇyabhipravṛṣya
S04bsu016_u:2699_1: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmākaṃ divyasaṃgītiṣu ratirna bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:2701: tata eṣo 'smākamupasaṃkrāntānāṃ sarvakāmarativinivartanatāyai yāvatsarvabuddhadharmapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayati //
S04bsu016_u:2702_0: daśa ca śakradevendraśatasahasrāṇi pratyekaṃ dvātriṃśadbhirupendraiḥ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivāraiḥ
S04bsu016_u:2707: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra asya saṃprekṣitena imāni meruśikharāṇi saṃprakampitāni /
S04bsu016_u:2708: te vayaṃ vyathitasaṃvignacittāḥ sarvajñatācittotpādanadṛḍhatayā sarvajñatājñāne praṇidhimabhinirharāmaḥ //
S04bsu016_u:2709_0: daśa ca nāgasahasrāṇi airāvatanandopanandanāgarājapramukhāni uparyantarikṣe gatāni
S04bsu016_u:2709_2: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo mahāgniskandharāśibhya ābhāḥ pramuktāḥ
S04bsu016_u:2710: krodhapravṛttiṃ caiṣāṃ praśamayitvā āśayaṃ prahlādya manaḥ prasādayanti /
S04bsu016_u:2713: atyayaṃ deśayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati //
S04bsu016_u:2714_0: daśa ca yakṣendrasahasrāṇi gaganatale sthitvā nānāvidhayā pūjayā pūjayitvā jayoṣmāyatanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:2714_1: brāhmaṇaṃ sudhanaṃ ca śreṣṭhidārakamevamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya
S04bsu016_u:2716: te maitracittā [Gv_93] aviheṭhanapratipannā asmatsakāśamupasaṃkrāmanti - vayamapīdānīṃ maitryādhipatyenābhibhūtāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2718: tadasmākamupasaṃkrāntānāmasya śarīraniryātā prabhā avabhāsya sarvaśarīraṃ sukhena spharati /
S04bsu016_u:2719: sa eṣo 'smākaṃ prīṇitakāyacittānāṃ tathā dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu016_u:2721_0: daśa ca gandharvendrasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - asmākamapi kulaputra
S04bsu016_u:2721_1: svabhavaneṣu vasatāmasya pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhya ābhā niścaritvā asmadbhavanānyavabhāsayati /
S04bsu016_u:2722: te vayaṃ tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭā acintyasukhasamarpitā etasyāntikamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2725: daśa ca asurendrasahasrāṇi mahāsamudrādabhyudgamya ākāśe dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalamavanāmyakṛtāñjalipuṭāni namasyamānāni evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:2726: pañcatapastapyato 'smākaṃ sarve 'suralokāḥ sasāgarāṇi saśailāni ca mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalāni prakampante /
S04bsu016_u:2727: tato vayaṃ save nihatamānamadadarpā vratatapobhibhūtā etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2728: upasaṃkrāntānāmeṣo 'smākaṃ sarvamāyāśāṭhyaprahāṇāya gambhīradharmakṣāntyavatārāya acaladharmatāpratiṣṭhānāya daśabalajñānapariniṣpattaye ca dharmaṃ deśayati //
S04bsu016_u:2729: daśa ca garuḍendrasahasrāṇi mahāvegadhārigaruḍendrapramukhāni udāraṃ māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:2730: pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnirāśibhyaḥ prabhā niścaritvā asmadbhavanānyavabhāsya saṃkampayati /
S04bsu016_u:2732: sa eṣa kulaputra, asmān dharmadeśanayā mahāmaitryāṃ saṃniyojayati /
S04bsu016_u:2739_0: daśa ca kinnarendrasahasrāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyato
S04bsu016_u:2741: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo bodhāya praṇidadhāti /
S04bsu016_u:2742: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo duṣkaraparityāgaṃ karoti /
S04bsu016_u:2745: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmevaṃnāmā bodhisattvo savāhanaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S04bsu016_u:2747: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma tathāgato 'navaśeṣabuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau [Gv_94] parinirvātīti /
S04bsu016_u:2748: aparyantaḥ kulaputra bhavejjambudvīpe sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatrapalāśānāṃ paramāṇubhāgaśaḥ paricchinnānām,
S04bsu016_u:2749: na tveva teṣāṃ tathāgatanāmnāṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhīnāṃ bodhisattvacaryāprasthānaviśeṣāṇām,
S04bsu016_u:2755: yadasmatpariṣadi aneke sattvā avivartyā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ //
S04bsu016_u:2756_1: pūjayā pūjayitvā evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhyastathārūpā prabhā niścaranti,
S04bsu016_u:2757: yayā prabhayā avīciparyantān sarvanirayānavabhāsya sarvanairayikasattvaduḥkhāni pratiprasrabdhāni /
S04bsu016_u:2759: te vayamasyopari cittāni prasādayitvā praṇīteṣu kāmāvacaradevanikāyeṣūpapannāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2760: ye vayamasya kṛtajñatayā darśanenāvitṛptāḥ sarvakāmaratimutsṛjya asya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2764_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ
S04bsu016_u:2764_1: imamevaṃ rūpaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā jayoṣmāyanate brāhmaṇe bhūtakalyāṇamitrāsaṃjñāmutpādya
S04bsu016_u:2764_2: jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evamāha - atyayamatyayato deśayāmyārya
S04bsu016_u:2765: atha khalu jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:2767: na kāṅkṣaye gurubhya ekadhā sthapitva mānasam /
S04bsu016_u:2768: tato 'sya sarva artha bhonti te 'pi ca pradakṣiṇāḥ
S04bsu016_u:2770: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastaṃ kṣuradhārācitaṃ parvataprapātamārgamabhiruhya tatra mahāgniskandhe prāpatat /
S04bsu016_u:2771: tena prapatatā supratiṣṭhito nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2772: tena cāgnisparśanena praśamasukhābhijño nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2775: sa āha - ahaṃ kulaputra, aparyādattamaṇḍalasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:2778: gaccha kulaputra, idamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:2779: tatra maitrāyaṇī nāma kanyā, rājñaḥ siṃhaketorduhitā, pañcakanyāśataparivārā /
S04bsu016_u:2780: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:2782_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:2785_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrācintyagocaraniryātaḥ udārādhimuktiviśuddho
S04bsu016_u:2785_8: nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya maitrāyaṇīṃ kanyāmanveṣamāṇaḥ parimārgamāṇo 'śrauṣīt - eṣā
S04bsu016_u:2785_9: maitrāyaṇī kanyā rājñaḥ siṃhaketorduhitā pañcakanyāśataparivārā vairocanagarbhaprāsādatalābhirūḍhā
S04bsu016_u:2785_10: uragasāracandanapāde suvarṇasūtrajālaścyote divyacīvaraprajñapte bhadrāsane upaviṣṭā dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:2786: śrutvā ca punaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ siṃhaketorgṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya rājño bahirdvāraśālāyāṃ pratyasthāt maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyā darśanakāmaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2790: dṛṣṭvā ca paripṛcchati - kva yūyaṃ gacchatha kulaputrāḥ, kva vā āgacchatha?
S04bsu016_u:2796: sa tasyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:2797: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:2798: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:2799: tadvadatu me āryā kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:2803: tadyathāpi nāma udakasarasi svacche 'nāvile viprasanne gaganaṃ candrādityaṃ jyotirgaṇapratimaṇḍitaṃ saṃdṛśyate pratibhāsayogena,
S04bsu016_u:2806: so 'nuvilokya tadbuddhadarśanavyūhanimittaṃ saṃdhārayan prāñjalībhūto maitryāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyā vacanaṃ saṃprekṣate sma /
S04bsu016_u:2807: sā provāca - ahaṃ kulaputra samantavyūhasya prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:2808: eṣa ca me samantavyūhaḥ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatanāmantikātparyanviṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2809: te ca me tathāgatā nānāmukhapraveśairetaṃ samantavyūhaṃ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartamavatārayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2811: āha - ka etasya ārye samantavyūhasya prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartasya viṣayaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:2812_1: upanidhyāyantyā anusarantyā vyavacārayantyā anuvicintayantyā ākārayantyā ādhārayantyā
S04bsu016_u:2812_2: vyūhayantyā abhinirharantyāḥ samalaṃkurvantyāḥ pravicinvantyāḥ samantamukhā nāma dhāraṇī ājāyate,
S04bsu016_u:2813_1: āmukhībhavanti abhipatanti parivartante - yaduta buddhakṣetramukhaṃ buddhamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:2817_5: yathāśayavijñaptinidarśanānāṃ sarvakālacakravaśavartināṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
S04bsu016_u:2818: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe trinayano nāma janapadaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2820: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:2822_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya maitrāyaṇīṃ
S04bsu016_u:2822_1: kanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:2825: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gambhīraṃ bodhisattvajñānavicāramanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:2837_0: anupūrveṇa yena trinayano janapadastenopasaṃkramya sudarśanaṃ bhikṣuṃ mārgayamāṇo
S04bsu016_u:2837_4: vanaṣaṇḍe caṃkramyamāṇaṃ daharaṃ taruṇamabhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyamabhinīlapradakṣiṇāvartakeśaṃ
S04bsu016_u:2839: tasya khalu punaḥ sudarśanasya bhikṣoścaṃkramyamāṇasyābhimukhadigāvṛtā digdevatā diṅbhaṇḍalamāvartayanti /
S04bsu016_u:2849: sadāvibodhanamaṇḍalā divasadevatā digrocanamaṇiratnadhvajagṛhītā gaganatale tiṣṭhanti ālokasaṃjananārthāya //
S04bsu016_u:2850_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sudarśano bhikṣustenopasaṃkramya sudarśanasya
S04bsu016_u:2850_1: bhikṣoḥ kramatalābhyāṃ nipatya sudarśanasya bhikṣoḥ kramatalaṃ paricumbya parilikhya
S04bsu016_u:2850_2: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito
S04bsu016_u:2851: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadāti, anuśāsanīmanuprayacchati /
S04bsu016_u:2852: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:2853: sa āha - ahaṃ kulaputra daharo jātyā, navakastu pravajyayā /
S04bsu016_u:2854: tena me kulaputra ekajanmanā aṣṭatriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmantike brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam /
S04bsu016_u:2869: kvacinme tathāgate yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyān kalpān brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇamanayaiva kalpasaṃkhyayā /
S04bsu016_u:2879: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāni svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtāni praṇidhimaṇḍalasamādhyabhinirhārabalena /
S04bsu016_u:2880: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryā svacaryāpariśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtā sarvacaryāvatārasamādhipratilambhabalena /
S04bsu016_u:2881: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pāramitāviśuddhirabhinirhṛtā samantabhadracaryāniryāṇabalena /
S04bsu016_u:2882: api tu khalu punarme kulaputra evaṃ caṃkramyamāṇasya sarvadiksrotomukhānyāvartante suvilokitajñānamukhatayā /
S04bsu016_u:2895: gaccha kulaputra, idamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śramaṇamaṇḍale janapade sumukhaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:2897: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:2899_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvavikramapratipadviśuddhiparamaḥ bodhisattvabalālokāvabhāsitacitto
S04bsu016_u:2899_6: sudarśanasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sudarśanaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:2902: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāṃ sudarśanasya bhikṣoranuśāsanīmanumantrayan,
S04bsu016_u:2905: prabhāṣamāṇaḥ pratibhāvayan udīrayan darśayan anuvicintayan abhyavacaran,
S04bsu016_u:2907_0: taddharmanayamanuvicārayan avabhārayan samavasaran āvartayan saṃbhindan pradarśayan
S04bsu016_u:2907_2: janapade sumukhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ indriyeśvaraṃ dārakaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2908: tasyoparyantarikṣe gatā devanāgayakṣagandharvā ārocayanti - eṣa kulaputra indriyeśvaro dārako nadīsaṃbhedābhyāśe daśadārakasahasraparivṛtaḥ pāṃśukrīḍayā krīḍatīti //
S04bsu016_u:2909: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sumukhaṃ nagaraṃ nadīsaṃbhedābhyāśastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2910: so 'drākṣīt indriyeśvaraṃ dārakaṃ daśadārakasahasraparivṛtaṃ pāṃśukrīḍayā krīḍantam /
S04bsu016_u:2911_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryenendriyeśvaro dārakastenopasaṃkramya indriyeśvarasya dārakasya pādau
S04bsu016_u:2911_2: dārakasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:2913: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyam śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:2914: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:2915: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:2916: āha - ahaṃ kulaputra mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena lipisaṃkhyāmudrāgaṇanānayaṃ śikṣayatā sarvaśilpābhijñāvabhāsajñānamukhamavatāritaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:2921_0: niveśayāmi pratiṣṭhāpayāmi śikṣayāmi śīlayāmi dṛḍhīkaromi sārikaromi saṃtarāmi saṃbhāvayāmi

S04bsu016_u:3046: sa taṃ bālikārāśiṃ gaṇayaṃstulayan prasiñcan saṃkhyāmakārṣīt - iyantīmāni vālikāphalakāni,

S04bsu016_u:4457: kvacidāsanaparivāre saṃniṣaṇṇasya vajrapāṇiparṣanmaṇḍalasya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānavajranārāyaṇavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:4458: iti hi yāvatyaḥ sarvopapattyāyatanasaṃbhedeṣu sattvaprajñaptayaḥ sattvagatayaḥ,

S04bsu016_u:4460_0: teṣāṃ tasmin mahodyāne samavasṛtya pratyekamāsanaparivārasaṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ nānāśayānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4464: ye ca tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānaṃ bodhisattvāstadanye vā sattvāḥ praviśanti siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā darśanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04bsu016_u:4466: bhikṣuṇyāḥ prathamaṃ kuśalamūladharmasamudāneṣu niyojitā yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheravivartyāḥ kṛtāḥ //
S04bsu016_u:4467_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā imāmevaṃrūpāmudyānasaṃpadaṃ
S04bsu016_u:4467_2: sarasvatīvyūhasaṃpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā acintyaṃ ca dharmanayaṃ śrutvā vipuladharmameghābhiṣyanditacittaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4468: atha siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ sarvaṃ tanmahodyānaṃ saparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭamavabhāsitam /
S04bsu016_u:4469: anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evaṃ saṃjānāti - pradakṣiṇīkurvaṃśca samantādabhimukhaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:4470: sa purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye, anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /

S04bsu016_u:4472: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4473: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam //
S04bsu016_u:4474: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra sarvamanyanāsamuddhātitasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:4475: āha - ka etasya ārye sarvamanyanāsamuddhātitasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:4477: āha - ka etasya ārye jñānālokasya viṣayaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:4478: āha - etanmama kulaputra jñānālokamukhamāyūhatyā niryūhatyāḥ sarvadharmopapanno nāma samādhirājāyate,
S04bsu016_u:4479_0: yasya samādheḥ sahapratilābhena manomayaiḥ kāyaiḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvekajātipratibaddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4483: ye ca sattvā mamedaṃ buddhapūjopasthānakarma prajānanti,
S04bsu016_u:4484: te sarve niyatā bhavanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:4485: ye ca sattvā māmupasaṃkrāmanti, teṣāmahaṃ sarveṣāmetāmeva prajñāpāramitāvavādānuśāsanīṃ dadāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4488: sarvajaganmantrasaṃjñāmudrāṃ śṛṇomi, na ca manye sarvavākpathānabhiniviṣṭatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:4489: sarvatathāgatān paśyāmi, na ca manye dharmaśarīraparijñānatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:4492: sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharāmi, na ca manye māyāgatadharmatāvabuddhatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:4494: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmanantamadhyadharmadhātvavatīrṇānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
S04bsu016_u:4495: ye te sarvadharmamanyanāvihāriṇaśca ekaparyaṅkena ca sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti /
S04bsu016_u:4503: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:4505: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4507_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:4520: taṃ sarvabodhisattvakarmasmṛtyupādānārambhanistīraṇapraṇidhiṃ paripūrayan anupūrveṇa yena durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrānto vasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīṃ parimārgan /
S04bsu016_u:4521: tatra ye puruṣā vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇānabhijñā jñānagocarāvidhijñāśca,
S04bsu016_u:4522_0: teṣāmetadabhavat - kimasya evaṃ śāntadāntendriyasya evaṃ saṃprajānasya evamabhrāntasya
S04bsu016_u:4523: na hīdṛśā rāgaratā bhavanti, na viparyastacittāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4532: ye punarvasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇaviśeṣābhijñā jñānagocarapratyakṣā vā,
S04bsu016_u:4540: eṣā kulaputra vasumitrā bhāgavatī nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasyottareṇa svagṛhe tiṣṭhati //
S04bsu016_u:4541: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka idaṃ vacanamupaśrutya tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā niveśanam,
S04bsu016_u:4542: tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamadrākṣīdvipulaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca daśaratnaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ daśaratnatālapaṅktiparivṛttam /
S04bsu016_u:4546_0: sa tatrāpaśyadvasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
S04bsu016_u:4548_0: tayā ca sarvaṃ tadgṛhaṃ sarvaratnabhavanavimānavyūhaṃ svaśarīraniryātayā premaṇīyayā
S04bsu016_u:4549: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
S04bsu016_u:4551: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4552: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4553: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4554: sā avocat - mayā kulaputra virāga koṭīgato nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4558: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra sarveṣāṃ rāgavirāgatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4559: te ca taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā rāgavirāgatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S04bsu016_u:4581: āha - kutra tvayā ārye kuśalamūlamavaropitam, kīdṛśaṃ ca karmopacitam, yasyāstaveyamīdṛśī saṃpat?
S04bsu016_u:4583: atīte 'dhvani atyuccagāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:4584: tasya kulaputra atyuccagāminastathāgatasya sattvānāmanukampārthaṃ sumukhāṃ nāma rājadhānīṃ praviśataḥ indrakīlamākrāmataḥ sarvaṃ tannagaraṃ prākampata /
S04bsu016_u:4585: vipulavistīrṇaṃ ca anekaratnamayaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt anekaratnaprabhāvyūhaṃ vividharatnapuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ nānādivyatūryapramuktanirghoṣam /
S04bsu016_u:4587: ahaṃ ca kulaputra tena samayena sumatirnāma śreṣṭhibhāryā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:4588: tato me buddhaprātihāryasaṃcoditayā svāminā sārdhaṃ pradhāvitvā tasya tathāgatasya vīthīmukhamupasaṃkrāntasya udāraprasādajātayā ekā ratnakākaṇiḥ pratipāditā /
S04bsu016_u:4592: kiṃ mayā śakyamanantopāyajñānakauśalapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vipulākṣayapuṇyakośānāmaparājitajñānaviṣayāṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātum, guṇān vā vaktum //
S04bsu016_u:4593: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śubhapāraṃgamaṃ nāma nagaram /
S04bsu016_u:4594: tatra veṣṭhilo nāma gṛhapatiścandanapīṭhaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ pūjayati /
S04bsu016_u:4595: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4597_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vasumitrāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4600: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena śubhapāraṃgame nagare veṣṭhilasya gṛhapaterniveśanaṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:4601: upetya veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:4602: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4603: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4604: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4605: so 'vocat - āhaṃ kulaputra aparyādattakoṭīgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:4606: na mama kulaputra saṃtānāttathāgataḥ parinirvṛto na parinirvāti na parinirvāsyati sarvalokadhātuṣu atyantaparinirvāṇena anyatra vainayikasattvavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu016_u:4608: tacca me caityadvāramuddhāṭayato 'kṣayabuddhavaṃśavyūho nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4609: etaṃ cāhaṃ kulaputra samādhiṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadye /
S04bsu016_u:4612_0: āha - etaṃ mama kulaputra samādhiṃ samāpannasya asmin lokadhātuvaṃśe buddhaparaṃparayā
S04bsu016_u:4613: buddhadarśanānusaṃdhau buddhaparaṃparānupacchedena cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe buddhaśataṃ paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4616: evaṃ buddhakoṭīṃ buddhakoṭīśataṃ buddhakoṭīsahasraṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasraṃ buddhakoṭyayutaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaṃ buddhakoṭīkaṅkaraṃ buddhakoṭībimbaram /
S04bsu016_u:4634: suvibhaktāṃ saṃbhinnāṃ caiṣāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ smarāmi, saṃdhārayāmi, smṛtyā codgṛhṇāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4644: yāvatsuvibhaktāṃ saṃbhinnāṃ caiṣāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ smarāmi, saṃdhārayāmi, smṛtyā codgṛhṇāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4649: yathā ceha lokadhātuvaṃśe pūrvāntāparāntaparyāpannānāṃ buddhaparaṃparāṃ paśyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:4651: tathā daśasu dikṣu anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu atītānāgateṣu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu sarvatathāgataparaṃparāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4654_2: ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu vairocanapramukhānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ paraṃparāmavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4658: yaṃ ca yadā tathāgataṃ draṣṭumākāṅkṣāmi, taṃ tadā paśyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4659: yacca taibuddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitaṃ bhāṣante bhāṣiṣyante, tatsarva śṛṇomi /
S04bsu016_u:4667_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ tryadhvaikakṣaṇajñānapratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣaṇakoṭīsamādhivyūhavihāriṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4668: gaccha kulaputra, ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe potalako nāma parvataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4670: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4673: gaccho hi sūdhana śirījalarājamadhye girirājapotalaki śobhani śūrabhāge /
S04bsu016_u:4675: tasmiṃśca parvatavare viharāti dhīro avalokiteśvaru vidū jagato hitāya /
S04bsu016_u:4676: taṃ gaccha pṛccha sudhanā guṇa nāyakānāṃ deśiṣyate vipulaśobhi nayapraveśam // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:4677: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya veṣṭhilaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4681: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateranuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
S04bsu016_u:4690_0: tadacintyaṃ tathāgatakarmābhimukhīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena potalakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:4690_1: potalakaṃ parvatamabhiruhya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo
S04bsu016_u:4690_5: deśayamānaṃ sarvajagatsaṃgrahaviṣayaṃ mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāmukhodyotaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayantam /
S04bsu016_u:4691_0: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ praharṣitavikasitānimiṣanayanaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4692: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ dūrata eva āgacchantamavalokya āmantrayāmāsa - ehi /
S04bsu016_u:4694_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya
S04bsu016_u:4694_1: avalokiteśvara bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4694_2: [Gv_160] pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
S04bsu016_u:4696: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4697: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4698: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam //
S04bsu016_u:4699_2: pāṇiṃ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu016_u:4701: ahaṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ nāma bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4703: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambabodhisattvacaryāmukhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pādamulānna vicalāmi,
S04bsu016_u:4710: tena mayā kulaputra idaṃ mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ pariśodhayatā sarvajagatpratiśaraṇapraṇidhirutpāditaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:4718: anenopāyena sattvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimocya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya avivartyān karomi buddhadharmapratilābhāya /
S04bsu016_u:4720_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapraṇidhānamaṇḍalaviśuddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4722: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇu stavitva ca gauraveṇa prakānta dakṣiṇapathaṃ sudhanaḥ sudāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4724: vajrāmaye giritaṭe maṇiratnacitre siṃhāsane padumagarbhi niṣaṇṇa dhīro /
S04bsu016_u:4726: dṛṣṭvopajāta atulā sudhanasya prīti upagamya vandati kramau guṇasāgarasya /
S04bsu016_u:4727: ovāca dehi mama ārya kṛpāṃ janitvā śikṣāṃ tu ahu labhe ima bhadracaryām // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:4728: bāhuṃ praṇamya vimalaṃ śatapuṇyacitraṃ prabhameghajāla vipulaṃ śubha muñcamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4729: mūrdhni sthihitva sudhanasya viśuddhasattvo avalokiteśvaru vidū vacanaṃ bhaṇāti // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:4730: ekaṃ vimokṣamukha jānami buddhaputra sarvajināna karuṇāghanajñānagarbham /
S04bsu016_u:4731: saṃbhūta sarvajagatrāyaṇasaṃgrahāya sarvatra vartati mamāpyatha ātmaprema // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:4732: trāyāmi sarvajanatāṃ vyasanairanekaiḥ ye gāḍhabandhanagatāriṣu hastaprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4733: gātreṣu viddha tatha cārakasaṃniruddhā mucyanti bandhanagatā mama nāma śrutvā // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:4735: utsṛṣṭaḥ vadhya nṛpatīna kṛtāparādhāḥ kṣiptā iṣu na ca kramanti śarīri teṣām /
S04bsu016_u:4736: chidyanti śastra parivartati tīkṣṇa dhārā ye nāmadheyu mama tatra anusmaranti // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:4737: rājāna madhyagata ye ca vivādaprāptā vijinanti sarvaripavo 'tha śubhe labhante /
S04bsu016_u:4738: vardhanti sarva yaśa mitrakule dhanāni bhontī adharṣiya smaritvana mahya nāma // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:4740: gacchanti nirbhaya jinitvana sarvaśatrūn ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:4741: kṣiptā manāgiritaṭītu praduṣṭacittairaṅgārakarṣu jvalitā api co vadhārtham /
S04bsu016_u:4742: padmāṅkurā jalanidhi jvalanā bhavanti ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:4743: prakṣipta sāgarajale na marenti tatra nadyāṃ na cohyati na dahyati cāgnimadhye /
S04bsu016_u:4744: sarve anartha na bhavantyapi cārthasiddhiḥ nāmaṃ mamā anusmaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:4745: haḍidaṇḍabandhanigaḍāśca tathā kudaṇḍā avamānanā tatha vimānana ṭhambhanāśca /
S04bsu016_u:4746: ākrośatāḍanavibhartsanatarjanāśca mama nāmadheyu smaramāṇa labhanti mokṣam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:4747: ye vairiṇo vivarachidragaveṣiṇaśca nityapraduṣṭamana ye ca avarṇavādī /
S04bsu016_u:4748: sahadarśanena tada maitramanā bhavanti bheṣyanti varṇi śruta mahya smaritva nāma // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:4749: vetālamantratha kakhorda sadā prayuktā ghātārtha teṣa ripavaḥ stimitā bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:4751: teṣa śarīri na kramanti viṣā aśeṣā ye nāmadheṣu mama kecidanusmaranti // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:4753: ojoharairbhayakaraiḥ supināntare 'pi śāmyanti sarvi mama nāma anusmaritvā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:4755: na dhanakṣayo nāpi upaiti daridrabhāvaṃ nāmaṃ mamā anusaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:4756: na ca gacchati cyuta ito narakaṃ avīciṃ na tiraścayoni na ca preta na cākṣaṇāni /
S04bsu016_u:4757: deve manuṣya upapadyati śuddhasattvo yo nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:4758: na ca andhakāṇabadhirā na pi carcigātrā na ca raudra khañjā atha cāṭaka prekṣaṇīyā /
S04bsu016_u:4759: sarvendriyairavikalā bahukalpakoṭyo bhontī narā mama smaritvana nāmadheyam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:4760: avalokiteti mama te sugatiṃ vajranti yo puṣpamuṣṭi mama okirate śarīre /
S04bsu016_u:4761: dhūpāṃśca dhūpayati yaśca dadāti chatraṃ vistārikai puja karoti prasannacitto
S04bsu016_u:4762: mama buddhakṣetri sa ca bheṣyati dakṣiṇīyaḥ // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:4763: upapadyate itu cyavitvana śuddhasattvo buddhāna saṃmukha daśaddiśi lokadhātau /
S04bsu016_u:4764: buddhāṃśca paśyati śṛṇoti ca teṣa dharmaṃ ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:4765: ete tathānya kṣayituṃ nimituṃ na śakyā yāvaccupāyi ahu sattva vinemi loke /
S04bsu016_u:4766: eko vimokṣa mama bhāvitu buddhaputra nāhaṃ guṇān guṇadharāṇa vijāni sarvān // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:4768: aṣṭāpadākṛtu daśaddiśi lokadhātau kalyāṇamitra samupāsita sūdhanena /
S04bsu016_u:4769: na ca tṛptu dharma śruṇamāṇu jinaurasānāṃ kasmānna prīti bhavati śruṇamāna dharmam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:4770: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ananyagāmī nāma bodhisattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaganatalenāgatya sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pratyaṣṭhāt /
S04bsu016_u:4771: samantarapratiṣṭhāpitau ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pādau,
S04bsu016_u:4774: tathārūpā ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena kāyāt prabhā pramuktā,
S04bsu016_u:4784: tasmiṃśca potalake parvate 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma //
S04bsu016_u:4785: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamiha parṣanmaṇḍale saṃprāptam?
S04bsu016_u:4787: āha - etaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4789_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:4792_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya jñānagāthālabdhacitto
S04bsu016_u:4792_2: bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya ananyagāmino bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ
S04bsu016_u:4792_3: prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:4793: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4794: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4795: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam //
S04bsu016_u:4796: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra samantamukhanirjavanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
S04bsu016_u:4797: āha - katamasya tvayā ārya tathāgatasya pādamūlādeṣa samantamukhanirjavano nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:4800: āha - durvijñeyametatkulaputra sthānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikayā prajayā - yaduta bodhisattvaparākramī bodhisattvavīryānivartyatā bodhisattvavīryasaṃhāryatā /
S04bsu016_u:4801_1: prajñācakṣuvirahitaiḥ śrotuṃ vā saṃdhārayituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā avatarituṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:4804: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi śrīgarbhavatyā lokadhātorāgacchāmi samantaśrīsaṃbhavasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt /
S04bsu016_u:4805: tasya me kulaputra samantaśrīsaṃbhavasya tathāgatasya pādamūlādeṣa samantamukhanirjavano nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4806: tataśca me kulaputra śrīgarbhavatyā lokadhātoruccalitasya anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ kalpāḥ kṣīṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4809: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi avirahitāni tathāgataiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:4811: anuttarayā manomayyā anabhisaṃskāradharmadhātumudrāmudritayā tathāgatānujñātayā sarvabodhisattvapraharṣasaṃjananyā tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4814: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmindriyacakraṃ parijñāya yathāśayādhimuktito rūpakāyaṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4820: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāḥ paścimāyāḥ uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:4824: gaccha kulaputra, ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe dvāravatī nāma nagarī /
S04bsu016_u:4826: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ - bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:4828_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nanyagāmino bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya
S04bsu016_u:4831_3: pratipadyamānaḥ samādhibhūmiṃ vicārayamāṇo dhāraṇībhūmau pratiṣṭhamānaḥ praṇidhānabhūmimavataran
S04bsu016_u:4832: tasya mahājanakāya ārocayāmāsa - eṣa kulaputra mahādevo nagaraśṛṅgāṭake devāgāre audārikeṇātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu016_u:4833_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena mahādevastenopasaṃkramya mahādevasya pādau
S04bsu016_u:4833_1: śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:4834: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:4835: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
S04bsu016_u:4836: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam //
S04bsu016_u:4837_0: atha khalu mahādevo devaścaturdiśaṃ caturaḥ pāṇīn prasārya caturbhyo mahāsamudrebhyaḥ
S04bsu016_u:4837_1: paramaśīghrajavena vāryānīya svamukhaṃ prakṣālya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavakīrya
S04bsu016_u:4845: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - durdṛṣṭighātanaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yena nirmalacittānāṃ svakāyapratibhāsaṃ darśayati /
S04bsu016_u:4850: āha - ka etasya ārya meghajālasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:4851_0: atha khalu mahādevoḥ devaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya purato mahāparvatamātraṃ suvarṇarāśimupadarśya
S04bsu016_u:4851_1: rūpyarāśiṃ vaiḍūryarāśiṃ sphaṭikarāśiṃ musāragalvarāśiṃ aśmagarbharāśiṃ jyotirasamaṇiratnarāśiṃ
S04bsu016_u:4851_5: cintārājamaṇiratnarāśiṃ sarvapuṣpāṇi sarvagandhān sarvadhūpān sarvamālyāni sarvavilepanāni
S04bsu016_u:4851_6: sarvacūrṇāni sarvavastrāṇi sarvacchatrāṇi sarvadhvajān sarvapatākāḥ sarvatūryāṇi
S04bsu016_u:4852: [Gv_168] asaṃkhyeyāni ca kanyākoṭīśatasahasrāṇyupadarśya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - itaṃ kulaputra gṛhītvā dānāni dehi,
S04bsu016_u:4855: sattvān dānena saṃgrahavastunā saṃgṛhya tyāgapāramitāyāṃ niyojaya,
S04bsu016_u:4859: evamaparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ dānacetanāniruddhānāṃ tyāgavāsitāṃ saṃtatiṃ karomi /
S04bsu016_u:4860: buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu bodhisattvakalyāṇamitreṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4861: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra kāmaratipramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ viṣayaparibhogaparigṛddhānāṃ tān viṣayānaśubhānadhitiṣṭhāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4862: krodhāviṣṭānāṃ mānamadadarpagarvitānāṃ vigrahavainayikānāṃ raudrarākṣasavikṛtabhayānantaśarīrān māṃsarudhirabhakṣānātmabhāvānupadarśya taṃ sarvaṃ stambhasaṃrambhamupadarśayāmi /

S04bsu016_u:4906: api tvahaṃ kulaputra jñānaduryodhanagarbhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /

S04bsu016_u:4958_0: sa tān nānopāyasaṃprayuktān dharmanayasāgarān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ

S04bsu016_u:4959: [Gv_172] so 'haṃ kalyāṇamitrādhiṣṭhānān sarvabuddhaguṇān saṃpaśyan kalyāṇamitrāśritamātmānaṃ karomi /

S04bsu016_u:4962: yastvamevaṃ kalyāṇamitrāveśāviṣṭaḥ kalyāṇamitravacanāni śuśrūṣuḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanyāṃ pratipadyase /

S04bsu016_u:4989_1: kinnararājarūpeṇa mahoragarāgarājarūpeṇa sāgaradevatārūpeṇa kaivartarūpeṇa pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:4990: tacca kuśalamūlamevaṃ pariṇāmayāmi - sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhaveyaṃ sarvaduḥkhaskandhavinivartanatāyai /

S04bsu016_u:4993: parvataprapātagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇabhayabhītānāṃ jīvitapratilambhāya yaśaskāmatāvaśagatānāṃ kīrtiśabdadhvajakāmānāṃ bhogārthikānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:4995: giriguhādarivivaragatānāṃ vividhaduḥkhopadrutānāṃ timirāndhakāravinivartanatāyai samapṛthivītalābhinirhāreṇa śaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /

S04bsu016_u:4999: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena vividhadṛṣṭigahanagatān sattvāṃstṛṣṇājālasaṃsaktān vicitrasaṃsāraduḥkhabhayopadrutān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayeyam /

S04bsu016_u:5001_2: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān skandhālayābhiniveśāduccālya anālayasarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyam /
S04bsu016_u:5002_2: saṃgṛhya samyak prīṇayitvā anikete dharme pratiṣṭhāpya
S04bsu016_u:5003: evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān svāyatanagrāmasaṃniśritān saṃsāragativiṣayagocarāduccālya sarvajñatāgocare pratiṣṭhāpayeyam //
S04bsu016_u:5005: ye ca kulaputra andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrāvekaikaśaḥ pūrvādidigvidikṣu sarvadiksaṃmūḍhā bhavanti,
S04bsu016_u:5009: teṣāmahaṃ digmārgadeśasaṃmūḍhānāṃ nānāvidhairupāyairavabhāsaṃ kṛtvā niṣkramitukāmānāṃ dvāraṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:5015: samaviṣamān pṛthivīpradeśān vividhāni ca rūpagatāni saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:5018: priyaviprayogotkaṇṭhitānāṃ mātāpitṛputradāramitrāmātyajñātisālohitān vividhāni ca manāpāni rūpagatāni saṃdarśayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:5019: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhameṣāṃ sattvānāmandhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau timiropahatanetrāṇāṃ diksaṃmūḍhānāmālokaṃ karomi,

S04bsu016_u:5025_0: glānānāmapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvānāṃ dīrghavyādhiparikhinnānāṃ durbalaśarīrāṇāṃ jīrṇānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:5025_1: vṛddhānāṃ jarābhibhūtānāmanāthānāṃ kṛpaṇānāṃ ca daridrāṇāṃ vilayagatānāṃ videśaprāptānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:5026: sāhaṃ kulaputra glānānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvopāyairvyādhyapanayanāya pratipadyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:5029: kṛpaṇadaridrāṇāṃ dhanakanakaskandhena saṃgrahaṃ karomi [Gv_175] vinipātagatānāṃ samānārthatayā saṃgrahaṃ karomi /
S04bsu016_u:5035: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhameṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhabhayopadravaparitrāṇe pratiśaraṇaṃ bhavāmi,
S04bsu016_u:5046: laukikāyāṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpya divyamānuṣikāyāṃ saṃpattau saṃniyojayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:5048: evamahaṃ sarvasattvānārye lokottare pāramitāmārge pratiṣṭhāpya sarvajñatāyāmavaivartyān kṛtvā samantabhadreṇa mahāpraṇidhānena sarvajñatāyāmupanayeyam /
S04bsu016_u:5050_0: atha khalu vāsantī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:5050_1: bodhisattvavimokṣadiśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo
S04bsu016_u:5052: kālamavekṣya jagatsukhanetā eṣa vimokṣanayo mama śāntaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:5053: maitri mamā vipulā suviśuddhā kalpa ananta subhāvita pūrve /
S04bsu016_u:5054: apāya pharitva prabhāsami lokaṃ eta nayottara sudhana sudhīrā // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:5055: karuṇasamudra mamāmita loke saṃbhavu yatra triyadhvajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:5057: yena jagasya dukhaṃ praśamemī eta nayottara sudhana sudhīrā // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:5058: lokasukhānyabhinirharamāṇā saṃskṛta ārya sukhāni ca yāni /
S04bsu016_u:5059: prīti udagra pramodami tena otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:5061: buddhabalaṃ pariśodhayamānā otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:5062: cakṣu mamā vipulaṃ pariśuddhaṃ yena daśaddiśi paśyami kṣetrā /
S04bsu016_u:5063: teṣu ca kṣetrataleṣu svayaṃbhūn paśyami bodhidrumendraniṣaṇṇān // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:5066: teṣu ca kṣetrapatheṣu ya sattvāḥ sarvacyutīupapattimukheṣu /
S04bsu016_u:5067: paśyami te gatisāgari bālāḥ saṃsaramāṇa svakarmanubhonti // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:5068: srotasamudra mamātiviśuddho yatra samosari śabda aśeṣāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:5069: sarvajagasya ya mantrasamudrā sarva śruṇitva dharemi smṛtīye // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:5071: yo hi pravartati cakru jinānāṃ taṃ ca śruṇitva dharemi smṛtīye // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:5075: jihva mamā vipula suprabhūtā tāmratanū ratanābha viśuddhā /
S04bsu016_u:5076: yāya jñapemi yathāśaya sattvān otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:5080: tatra samosari sarvanarendrān no ca vikalpana vidyati mahyam // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:5081: kṣetrataleṣu acintiya sattvāḥ teṣa prajānami cittasamudrān /
S04bsu016_u:5082: indriyaāśaya jānami teṣāṃ no ca vikalpana vidyati mahyam // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:5083: ṛddhi mamo vipulā susamāptā kampayi kṣetra acintiyāya /
S04bsu016_u:5084: kāyaprabhāya prabhāvatu yeno sarva sudurdama sattva damemi // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:5085: puṇya mamo vipulaṃ pariśuddhaṃ akṣayakoṣa samantaviyūham /
S04bsu016_u:5086: yena pravartayi pūja jinānāṃ bhoti ca sarvajagatyupajīvyam // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:5087: prajña mamo vipulā suviśuddhā yāya prajānami dharmasamudrān /
S04bsu016_u:5088: saṃśaya chindami sarvajanānāṃ otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:5090: buddhasamudra ahaṃ avatīrṇā sarvi triyadhvi nayottaramānā /
S04bsu016_u:5091: teṣu ca otaramī praṇidhānaṃ eṣa nayo atulaḥ susamāptaḥ // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:5092: sarvaraje ahu kṣetrasamudrān paśyami caiva triyadhvapraveśān /
S04bsu016_u:5093: tatra ca paśyami buddhasamudrā teṣa samantatalaṃ nayabhūmim // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:5094: paśya virocana bodhivibuddhaṃ sarvadiśāsu spharitvana kṣetrā /
S04bsu016_u:5096: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S04bsu016_u:5099_0: evamukte vāsantī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ jinaputra
S04bsu016_u:5099_1: atīte 'dhvani sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa praśāntaprabho nāma kalpo
S04bsu016_u:5101: tasyāṃ khalu punarlokadhātau ratnacandrapradīpaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikā /
S04bsu016_u:5103: tatra rājadhānyāṃ sudharmatīrtho nāma rājābhūt dhārmiko dharmarājā cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:5104: sa tāmakaṇṭakāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ sasāgaragiriparyantāṃ dharmeṇābhinirjitya adhyāvasati sma //
S04bsu016_u:5105: tasya sudharmatīrthasya rājño dharmamaticandrā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:5106: sā rātryāḥ pūrve yāme madanamattā ratikrīḍāpariśrāntā madhyame yāme 'ntaḥpuramadhyagatā prasuptā /
S04bsu016_u:5107_0: atha tasyāḥ padmaprabhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa śamathaśrīsaṃbhave mahāvanaṣaṇḍe sarvadharmanigarjitarājo
S04bsu016_u:5108: tenāsau sarvo ratnaśrīsaṃbhavo lokadhāturanekavarṇayā udārayā prabhayā sphuṭāvabhāsito 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:5109: tasyāṃ ca padmaprabhayāṃ rājadhānyāṃ suviśuddhacandrābhā nāma rātridevatā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:5110_0: sā tāṃ dharmamaticandrāṃ rājabhāryāmupasaṃkramya ābharaṇasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena prabodhya
S04bsu016_u:5110_1: evamāha - yatkhalu rājapatni jānīyāḥ - śamathaśrīsaṃbhave mahāvanaṣaṇḍe sarvadharmanigarjitarājo
S04bsu016_u:5111: sā tasyā rājabhāryāyāḥ purato vistareṇa buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ buddhavikurvitaṃ samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaṃ ca saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:5112: [Gv_179] sā khalu punaḥ kulaputra rājabhāryā tathāgataprabhāvabhāsitādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitā /
S04bsu016_u:5114: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmamaticandrā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt?
S04bsu016_u:5116: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmamaticandrā nāma rājabhāryā abhūvam //
S04bsu016_u:5117: sā ahaṃ kulaputra tenābhilāṣikeṇa cittotpādena tena ca tathāgatāvaropitena kuśalamūlena sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairna jātu durgatiṣūpapannā /
S04bsu016_u:5118: na narake, na tiryagyonau preteṣu vā, na jātu hīnakuleṣūpapannā /

S04bsu016_u:5912_0: tasyāḥ khalu punarvairocanaśriyo lokadhātoḥ pūrveṇa cakravālānusaṃdhau ratnakusumapradīpadhvajā

S04bsu016_u:5932: tena ca kālena tena samayena amitāyuṣaḥ sattvā abhūvan na niyatāyuṣaḥ, nāsti antareṇa kālakriyā /

S04bsu016_u:5950: so 'nekavarṣasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇena sattvān paripācya daśavarṣasahasraṃ raśmyavabhāsavikurvitena paripācayāmāsa tatra daśabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgataḥ prādurbhaviṣyatīti /

S04bsu016_u:5955: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvarūpāṇi sūkṣmāṇyapaśyan - aṣṭābhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /

S04bsu016_u:5960: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ paripūrṇā avikalasarvendriyāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante sma - ṣaḍbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /

S04bsu016_u:5975: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatotpādasaṃjñāṃ pratyalabhanta - saptāhena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
S04bsu016_u:5977: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ buddhadarśanamahāprītivegasaṃjātā abhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:5978_1: sattvān paripācya saptame divase pūrṇe [Gv_210] sarvaṃ taṃ lokadhātumapramāṇaiḥ saṃkampananayaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:5978_2: saṃkampya ekāntapariśuddhāmadhyatiṣṭhat yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ /

S04bsu016_u:7290: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūtsarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ pitā?
S04bsu016_u:7292: śuddhodanaḥ sa rājā tena kālena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7293: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7295: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:7296: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anye tena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:7297: ye tatra jambudvīpe upapannāḥ rājñā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣeṇa caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7299: ime te bodhisattvāḥ sarve ihaiva bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamavasṛtā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7301: kecid dvitīyāyāṃ kecitṛtīyāyāṃ keciccaturthyāṃ bhūmau kecitpañcamyāṃ kecitṣaṭhyāṃ kecitsaptamyāṃ kecidaṣṭabhyāṃ kecinnavamyāṃ keciddaśamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7303_0: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva vipulaprītisaṃbhavanidhānasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7303_1: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7304: cakṣurmamā jinasutā vipulaṃ yeno vilokayami sarvadiśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7305: kṣetrodadhīn bahuvidhān vipulān sattvārṇavānapi ca saṃsarataḥ // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:7315: sattvān gatiṣvapi ca saṃsarato buddhān vikurvitagaṇaiśca saha // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:7316: tacca smarāmi khalu lokavidāṃ teṣāṃ yathā prathamakaḥ praṇidhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7322: yā nirvṛtīparimāṇaguṇā dharmasthiterapi ca yo niyamaḥ // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:7323: ye yānasāgaranayā vimalā ye caiva sattvavinayā vipulāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7326: mama bhāvito vipula kalpaśatānyetaṃ tvamapyavatarāśu nayam // 81 //
S04bsu016_u:7330: iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā nāma rātridevatā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu016_u:7331: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:7335_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:7338: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7340: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā praṇamya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān darśananayānanusmaramāṇo 'ntaradharaṇitale praṇipatya suciramatināmayāmāsa //
S04bsu016_u:7341_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tasmāddharaṇitalādutthāya prāñjalībhūtaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā
S04bsu016_u:7341_1: rātridevatāyāḥ kāyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇo daśa saṃjñāviśuddhīḥ pratilabhate sma,
S04bsu016_u:7355: yāsāṃ pratilābhāt sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvasabhāgatāḥ pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:7441_0: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prasannacittaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7441_1: rātridevatāmavalokayan āsāṃ daśānāṃ saṃjñāviśuddhīnāṃ pratilābhādetatpramukhān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:7442_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā
S04bsu016_u:7443: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:7444: yathā svacitte vaśitā mamāsti chandaśca bodhau sudṛḍho 'nivartyaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7445: tvadīyacitte 'pi hi me tathaiva svataiva devyadya dṛḍhopajātā // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:7448: cittaṃ guṇaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ me pṛthagvidhaiḥ sattvahitapravṛttaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7450: nidarśitā te khalu sarvadharmān niṣpattirārye madanugrahāya /
S04bsu016_u:7457: puṇyārṇavā me gaganapramāṇāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ cetasi codbhavanti // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:7460: saṃvardhitaḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ śubhaiśca sarvajñapaṭṭaṃ nacireṇa lapsye // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:7463: sarve yato 'rthāḥ prabhavanti cāsmāt siddhaśca kalyāṇaguṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7465: ācāryabhūtā mi guṇāprameye sarvajñadharmeṣu mama praṇetrī /
S04bsu016_u:7466: na kalpakoṭīnayutairasaṃkhyaiḥ śakyaṃ mayā te pratikartumārye // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:7467_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7468: vadasva me devate - ko nāmāyaṃ vimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:7471: evamukte sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sarvasattvaparipākasaṃcodanakuśalasaṃbhavo nāma kulaputra ayaṃ vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7472_0: ahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā sarvadharmasvabhāvavasamatāmanubuddhya
S04bsu016_u:7472_1: sarvadharmaprakṛtimavatīrya anālayaṃ dharmaṃ niśritya sarvalokoccālitā suvibhaktarūpatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7472_2: dharmāṇāmavatīrya avisabhāgavarṇā avaivartavarṇā avikalpavarṇā anīlavarṇā apītavarṇā
S04bsu016_u:7472_4: avisabhāgā anānātvā avaimātryā avikalpā anīlā apītā alohitā anavadātavarṇā,
S04bsu016_u:7476_5: ca tathāgatasya anantamadhyāni vikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānā pūrvakāṇi kuśalamūlāni saṃcodayāmi /
S04bsu016_u:7480: praticittakṣaṇaṃ ca anantamadhyaṃ sattvadhātumanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi //
S04bsu016_u:7481: yatpunaḥ kulaputra evaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirasaṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S04bsu016_u:7485: na tatra saṃsāradīrghatā vā saṃsārahrasvatā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate /
S04bsu016_u:7486: kalpasaṃkliṣṭatā vā kalpaviśuddhatā vā kalpaparīttatā vā kalpamahadgatatā vā kalpabahutvaṃ vā kalpanānātvaṃ vā kalpanānākaraṇaṃ vā kalpavimātratā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate vā /
S04bsu016_u:7488: prakṛtisvabhāvapariśuddhaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasaṃjñājālanirmuktaṃ sarvāvaraṇaparvatasamatikrāntamāśaye udeti /
S04bsu016_u:7490: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍale rātriṃdivaṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate, na saṃvasati /
S04bsu016_u:7492: udāgate ca sūryamaṇḍale divasaḥ prajñāyate prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:7493: evameva kulaputra avikalpe bodhisattvajñānamaṇḍale sarvakalpavikalpaparikalpā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:7495: atha ca punarbodhisattvāśayoditā vikalpajñānamaṇḍalaprabhena sarvasattvaparipākakālavaśena kalpasaṃvāsasaṃsārasaṃjñāgatagaṇanāsaṃkhyā prabhāvyate /
S04bsu016_u:7497_0: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍalaṃ gaganatalagataṃ sarvaratnaparvateṣu sarvaratnadrumeṣu
S04bsu016_u:7509: na ca kalpavikalpaiḥ saṃvasati, na cāsya kalpe dīrghasaṃjñā bhavati na hrasvasaṃjñā /
S04bsu016_u:7513: tadyathā kulaputra mahānadyādiṣu yānapātraṃ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya prayuktamapratiprasrabdhaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:7514: yāvajjīvaṃ na cāsya apārime tīre 'bhiniveśo bhavati na pārime,
S04bsu016_u:7516: evameva kulaputra bodhisattvo mahāpāramitāyānapātrabalena saṃsāranadīsrotasaḥ sarvasattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:7517: na cāsya apārime tīre utrtrāso bhavati, na pārime tīre kṣemasaṃjñā /
S04bsu016_u:7518: atha ca punaḥ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:7522: evameva kulaputra bodhisattva āśayajñānagaganatalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānavātamaṇḍalīparivṛtaṃ sarvadurgatiprapātebhyaḥ sattvān saṃdhārayamāṇaḥ na parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:7527: tadyathā kulaputra māyāgatanivṛttasya puruṣasya sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaparipūrṇasya daśa śarīrasthā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
S04bsu016_u:7533: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ vā pīḍā vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:7536_0: yaduta saṃsārābhilāṣo vā saṃsārabhavagatyupapattinirvedo vā viṣayaratyanunayo vā
S04bsu016_u:7536_1: pratighātacittatā vā upabhoktukāmatā vā sarvakleśaparitāpo vā duḥkhavedanānubhāvo
S04bsu016_u:7536_2: vā viṣayagatyupapattibhayaṃ vā bhavābhilāṣo vā abhiniveśo vā /
S04bsu016_u:7537: api tu khalu kulaputra nirdekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena anāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ vipulabodhisattvapraṇidhānabalavivardhanatāyai //
S04bsu016_u:7538: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7539: tasyāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputra ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7540: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyupapadyante sma /
S04bsu016_u:7541_0: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra daśānāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāṃ prāthamakalpiko dharmacakranirghoṣagaganapradīparājo
S04bsu016_u:7541_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu016_u:7543: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra tathāgato madhye [Gv_273] cāturdvīpakasya rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā nātidūre upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7544: tasyāḥ khalu punā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa suprabhaṃ nāma vanaṣaṇḍamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7545: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe vanaṣaṇḍe ratnakusumamegho nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7546: tasmin khalu ratnakusumameghe bodhimaṇḍe vairocanamaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:7547: yatra sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīrājastathāgato niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7548: tena ca samayena manuṣyāṇāṃ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7549: atha prāṇātipātiṣu sarveṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu adattādāyiṣu kāmamithyācāriṣu mṛṣāvādiṣu paiśunikeṣu pāruṣikeṣu saṃbhinnapralāpiṣu abhidhyāluṣu vyāpannacitteṣu mithyādṛṣṭiṣu,
S04bsu016_u:7550_0: evaṃ daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vipulībhūteṣu supratiṣṭhiteṣu sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ
S04bsu016_u:7550_1: paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ bodhimaṇḍagato bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa lokendrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7550_2: ca pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ kuśalamūlaparipācanāya //
S04bsu016_u:7551: tena ca samayena tasyāṃ rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:7552_0: tena adattādāyināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ caurāṇāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ prāṇātipātināṃ kāmamithyācāriṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7552_1: mṛṣāvādināṃ paiśunikānāṃ pāruṣikāṇāṃ saṃbhinnapralāpināṃ abhidhyālūnāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:7553: rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ jayaprabhasya vijitāvī nāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgato 'ṣṭaviṃśatibhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7554: atha sa sarasvatisaṃgītiprāsādābhirūḍho mahāstrīgaṇaparivāraparivṛtaḥ teṣāṃ cārakāvaruddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhagāḍhabandhanabaddhānāṃ bhairavamutkrośaśabdamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:7555_0: śrutvā ca punarudvignaḥ saṃvignacitto mahākaruṇāsaṃjātaḥ tasmātprāsādādavatīrya taccārake
S04bsu016_u:7555_4: keśābhicchāditakāyān urunigaḍabandhanabaddhān vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān duḥkhavedanāmanubhavamānānanekavidhān
S04bsu016_u:7556: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahatkāruṇyamutpādya udārakaruṇāśayasaṃjātaḥ parahitādhāno 'dbhutacetāścārakagahanagatān sattvān samāśvāsayāmāsa bandhanavipramokṣāya /
S04bsu016_u:7557: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ datvā yena rājā jayaprabhastenopasaṃkramya evamāhayatkhalu devo jānīyāt - mayā bandhanāgārabandhanagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇyādabhayaṃ dattam /
S04bsu016_u:7559: atha jayaprabheṇa rājñā sarvāṇi pañcāmātyaśatāni saṃnipātya paripṛṣṭāniyuṣmākaṃ kathaṃ bhavati?
S04bsu016_u:7560: ta āhuḥ - ete rājakośavilopino rājño vadhāya parākrāntāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7563: vadha evaiṣāṃ daṇḍo bandhanagatānāṃ vā maraṇam /
S04bsu016_u:7566: atha khalu sa vijitāvī rājaputro mahākaruṇāparipīḍitastānamātyān provācatathāstu yathā yūyaṃ vadatha /
S04bsu016_u:7574: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastān sarvān bandhanagatān sattvāṃstasmādbandhanāgārātparimocayati sma ātmaparityāgena sarvaparivāreṇa sarvadhanaskandhena /
S04bsu016_u:7575: sa tān parimocya yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhopadhānaṃ tadutsṛjya na vinivartayate sma /
S04bsu016_u:7576: atha tāni pañcāmātyaśatānyūrdhvabāhūni utkrośamānāni jayaprabhaṃ rājānamupasaṃkramya evamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - vijitāvinaḥ kumārasya cchandenāyaṃ rājakośo vilupyate /
S04bsu016_u:7578: yadi devo vijitāvino rājakumārasya nigrahaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:7580: atha khalu jayaprabho rājā kupito vijitāvinaṃ rājakumāraṃ saha tairaparādhibhiḥ puruṣairvadhāyotsṛṣṭavān /
S04bsu016_u:7581_0: tasya mātā janetrī tacchrutvā udvignā strīsahasraparivṛtā pramuktakeśī nirābharaṇagātrī
S04bsu016_u:7581_1: svamukhaṃ vyālupya urastāḍayantī pāṃśvavakīrṇaśiraskā krandamānā ārtasvaraṃ rudantī
S04bsu016_u:7581_2: rājānamupasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayornipatya evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa - pramuñca deva
S04bsu016_u:7583: atha rājā vijitāvinaṃ kumāraṃ saṃmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā evamāhaṃ - utsṛja kumāra etānaparādhino manuṣyān /
S04bsu016_u:7585: sa vadhamabhyupagatavānasaṃlīnena cittena asaṃkucitena sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktena parahitapariṇatena mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamena /
S04bsu016_u:7586: tasya janetryā rājā jayaprabho 'rdhamāsaṃ yācito darśanāya-ardhamāsaṃ kumāro dānaṃ dadātu yasya yenārthaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7589: atha tasyā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā uttareṇa pūrvayajñavāṭaprakṛtaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ nāma mahodyānam /
S04bsu016_u:7590: tatra kumāro 'bhiniṣkramya yasya yenārthaḥ tasya tatprādāt /
S04bsu016_u:7591: tena nirargalaṃ yajñaṃ yajatā ardhamāsaṃ vividhā dānavidhayo dattāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:7596_0: adrākṣīt sa mahājanakāyo vijitāvī ca rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7596_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7596_2: śāntamānasaṃ guptaṃ jitendriyaṃ nāgamiva sudāntaṃ hradamivācchaṃ viprasannamanāvilaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7596_3: mahatā buddhavikurvitaprātihāryeṇa mahatyā buddhavṛṣabhitayā virocayamānaṃ buddhādhipateyenābhibhavantaṃ
S04bsu016_u:7598_0: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumāraḥ sa ca mahān janakāyastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ

S04bsu016_u:8081: ityevaṃ bodhisattvo māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhiniṣkramaṇaṃ saṃdarśayāmāsa māyāgatarūpavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā anāgatadharmatayā anutpādānirodhalokavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā //
S04bsu016_u:8082: ityevamahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi iha lumbinīvane viharamāṇā /
S04bsu016_u:8083: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra syāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8084: tathā sarvāvatyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ sarvatra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8085: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya koṭīśataṃ janmavikurvitānāmavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8087: tadanantareṇa cittena buddhakṣetrasahasraparamāṇurajontargateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ekaikatra buddhatatsamānyeva bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8088: etena nayena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajontargateṣu [Gv_295] buddhakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre sarvāṇi bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8090: sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparaṃparāṇāṃ na ca paryantamupaimi sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre buddhasattvajanmaparaṃparāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:8092_0: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyāsu lokadhātuṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena
S04bsu016_u:8094_0: āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetrakoṭīparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8094_1: pareṇa parataramīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka
S04bsu016_u:8094_2: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8094_3: buddho bhagavān samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau samāpadyate kalpe 'śītibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprabhave /
S04bsu016_u:8095: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitravyūhaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8096: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya meruviśuddhavyūhadhvajā nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8097: tasyāṃ khalu rājadhānyāṃ ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8098: rājñaḥ khalu kulaputra ratnārcinetraprabhasya rājñaḥ suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma bhāryābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8099: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe māyādevī bhagavato vairocanasya janetrī,
S04bsu016_u:8100_0: evameva kulaputra tena kālena tena samayena tasyāṃ vicitravyūhaprabhāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8100_1: jambudvīpe suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma tasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya
S04bsu016_u:8101: yathā teṣāmaśītibuddhakoṭīniyutānāṃ pūrvaṃgamasya prāthamakalpikasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt /
