S04bsu016_u:8408: yathā ca ahaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ lokadhātau atītavartamānān kalpasamudrān nānāvidhānavatarāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8422: yathā cāsya samantadikprabhāsavairocanasya lokadhātuvaṃśasya daśadigānantaryaparaṃparāvasthitāsu sarvalokadhātuṣu prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8423: evamiha sarvāvati kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāreṣu lokadhātusumeruṣu lokadhātusamudrāntargateṣu lokadhātuprasareṣu prajānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8424_0: evaṃ lokadhātunayeṣu lokadhātucakreṣu lokadhātumaṇḍaleṣu lokadhātuvibhāgeṣu lokadhātunadīṣu
S04bsu016_u:8425: yathā ca asmin kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre prajānāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8426: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu anantaparyanteṣu dharmadhātuparameṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣu vairocanasya pūrvapraṇidhānasāgarān prajānāmi avatarāmi anusmarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8458: ye ca bhagavatā purvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sattvasamudrāḥ paripācitāstānapyavatarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8468: yathā ca bhagavato vairocanasya sarvasmin dharmadhātau bodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi,
S04bsu016_u:8469: evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi /
S04bsu016_u:8472: eṣa hi kulaputra asya sarvabodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8484: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāṃ śākyakanyāmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyamārye bodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:8485: āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa abhayaṃkarā nāma lokadhāturabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8486: tasyāṃ khalu lokadhātau gatipravaro nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8487: tasyāḥ khalu punarlokadhātormadhye kṣemāvatī nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8488: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya drumameruśrīrnāma rājadhānyabhūccaturaśīternagarakoṭīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:8491: teṣāṃ khalu punarmahānagarāṇāṃ sarvaratnavṛkṣahemajālālaṃkārādibhyo vātasaṃghaṭṭitebhyo bahutūryanirghoṣasamarutaniścaritebhyo 'yamevaṃrūpa ānandaśabdo niścarati sma - snāta,
S04bsu016_u:8498: tasyāṃ khalu drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt maṇḍalikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8501_0: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ pañca putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8502: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma agramahiṣī abhūt teṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ strīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
S04bsu016_u:8509: pādatalayoścāsya cakrāṇi jātāni sahasrārāṇi sanābhīni sanemikāni sarvākāraparipūrṇāni surucirāṇi darśanīyāni /
S04bsu016_u:8512: ubhe cāsya hastapādatale jālinī abhūtāṃ vicitrasuvibhaktācchidrāparisrāviṇī,
S04bsu016_u:8516: sa tāḥ samaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa, samuddharati sma /
S04bsu016_u:8518: sa tairyān spṛśati striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:8521: tasya jaṅghe anupurvasamudgate abhūtāṃ racite vṛtte sujāte eṇeyasyeva mṛgarajñaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8522: nainaṃ kaścitsamartho 'nujavitumanaprāptuṃ vā, na ca vrajan klamamāpadyate sma /
S04bsu016_u:8524: tasya dvayoḥ pādayordvāvutsadau jātāvabhūtāṃ vṛttau sujātau suparipūrṇāvadṛśyasaṃdhī suracitau darśanīyau,
S04bsu016_u:8529: nāsya kaścitstrī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā vṛddho vā madhyo vā daharo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā nirvasanasyāpyapaśyadanyatra svaparibhogena naimittikena vā kāmopacitena /
S04bsu016_u:8532: khalu punarabhavat sūpacitaśarīraḥ suvibhaktasamucchrayaḥ sarvakāyasamabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ anūnagātraḥ anunnatagātro 'pariṇatagātro maṇiphalakavisṛṣṭātirekadyutigātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8536: so 'navanamanenobhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ jānumaṇḍale parimārjati, parāmṛśati samabhāgasthitena śarīreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:8537: vṛhadṛjugātramahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarabhavat sarvāvaropetaparamāṇusamagātraḥ praśamagātro gurugātraḥ prasannagātraḥ prahlādagātraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8539: tasya yāvatyo grīvāsāmantakena mukhasāmantakena ca rasaharaṇyaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8540: tāḥ sarvāḥ samā abhūvan samantāḥ suparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8544: tasya kiṃcidbhaktaparibhogeṣu ekavāramapi mukhabhaktaṃ parivartamānamasaṃbhinnamabhyavahāramagamat antaśa ekodanabindurapi /
S04bsu016_u:8546: aviralā aviṣamā asya dantā abhūvan acchidrasaṃdhayaḥ samāṃ suvibhaktāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:8548: vā upakledo vā abhiṣyando vā paryavanāho vā atisarjanaṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:8549_0: samadantatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ khalu punarabhavat samadanto nonadanto nādhikadanto
S04bsu016_u:8549_1: nonnatadanto na saṃnatadanto na saṃbhinnadantaḥ samantamadhyadanto 'nutsannadanto
S04bsu016_u:8550: suśukladaṃṣṭraśca kumāro 'bhūt nirupakleśadaṣṭraḥ suprasannadaṃṣṭraḥ supariśuddhadaṃṣṭraḥ susaṃsthitavicitradaṃṣṭraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8552: [Gv_311] prabhūtā cāsya jihvā abhūt tanvī mṛdvī sukumārā karmaṇyā kamanīyā laghuparivartinī mukhamaṇḍalasaṃchādanī tathyapathyārthavyañjanapadaniruktyadhiṣṭhānasaṃprayuktā /
S04bsu016_u:8555: brahmātirekeṇa svareṇa ca parṣanmaṇḍalamatikrāmati, sarvaṃ ca anuravati /
S04bsu016_u:8556: abhinīlanetraśca sa kumāro 'bhūdacchanetraḥ pariśuddhanetraḥ prabhāsvaranetraḥ viprasannanetro 'bhirūpanetro
S04bsu016_u:8558: gopakṣmo sa kumāro 'bhūtpadmarāgasuviśuddhacakṣurāyatanaḥ samanetraraṅgaḥ samasadṛśanetraraṅgaḥ sujātanetraraṅgaḥ āyatanetraraṅgaḥ paripūrṇanetraraṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhitanetraraṅgaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8559: bhruvontare cāsya ūrṇā jātābhūnmṛdvī karmaṇyā sukumārākulasaṃsparśā svacchā śuddhā prabhāsvarā himaguḍikātuṣāravarṇā suśuklaraśmimaṇḍalaprabhāvabhāsā /
S04bsu016_u:8560_0: murdhni ca asyoṣṇīṣamabhinirvṛttamabhūt sujātaṃ samantaparimaṇḍalaṃ madhyābhinyastakeśālaṃkāraṃ
S04bsu016_u:8562: nāsya kāye rajo vā malo vā kledo vā jālaṃ vā valī vā śaithilyaṃ vā bhaṅgo vā prasaraṇaṃ vā visaraṇaṃ vā asamaṃ vā asthiṣata /
S04bsu016_u:8565: ekaikaromasya ekaikasmin romakūpe roma jātamabhūnnīlavaiḍūryavarṇapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalajātaṃ suparisaṃcitaṃ suniviṣṭaṃ supratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu016_u:8566: ūrdhvāṅgaromā ca sa kumāro 'bhūdavinivartanīyaromā apratyudāvartanīyaromā asaṃsṛṣṭaromā /
S04bsu016_u:8569_0: tasya nīlāḥ keśā abhūvan vairocanamaṇiratnanīlavarṇanirbhāsāḥ snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sukuñcitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8569_1: pradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalinaḥ sujātamūlā anuddhatāḥ niṣpīḍitā asaṃlulitāḥ samasadṛśasthānasaṃsthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8570: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punaḥ tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt samantabhadraparimaṇḍalaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8572: pṛṣṭhato 'pi dakṣiṇato 'pi vāmato 'pi gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi atṛptikaramanāpacārudarśano 'bhut /
S04bsu016_u:8573_0: ebhiḥ kulaputra dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtakāyaḥ sa tejodhipatī rājakumāro
S04bsu016_u:8574: sa khalu kulaputra tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'pareṇa samayena pitrābhyanujñāto drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā gandhāṅkuraprabhameghaṃ nāmodyānam,
S04bsu016_u:8575_0: tatra bhūmidarśanāya abhiniryayau viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ mahatā puṇyatejautaḥśrīsaubhāgyavikurvitavyūhena
S04bsu016_u:8576_0: tasya tathā vrajato 'ṣṭavartmā mārgaḥ samavasthiṣata nimnonnatavigato 'pagataśarkarakaṭhallotsado
S04bsu016_u:8578: tatra keṣucidratnavyomakeṣu vividharatnaparipūrṇāni ratnabhājanāni sthāpitānyabhūvan yācanakasaṃghapratipādanakārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8586: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhadivyamanojñavarṇagandhāḥ sarvagandhavidhayaḥ sthāpitā abhuvan vilepanārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8587: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvopakaraṇarāśayaḥ sthāpitā abhūvan sattvānāṃ yathāśayābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
S04bsu016_u:8588_0: keṣucidvyomakeṣu nāryo 'bhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vividhacārurūpaveśā vicitramanojñavastrasaṃdhitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8589: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūdrājaparibhogyā /
S04bsu016_u:8590_0: tasyāḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma dārikābhūdabhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā nātidīrghā
S04bsu016_u:8590_1: nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurā nātiśyāmā abhinīlanetrā abhinīlakeśī abhirāmavaktrā
S04bsu016_u:8590_2: brahmasvarā madhurapriyavādinī prājñā sarvakalāvidhijñā sarvaśāstrakovidā dakṣā analasā
S04bsu016_u:8590_3: sagauravā saprasādā maitracittā apratighātabahulā atṛptikaramanāpadarśanā mandarāgadoṣamohā
S04bsu016_u:8590_4: hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā mārdavā ṛjvī aśāṭyā amāyā [Gv_313] vinītā /
S04bsu016_u:8591_0: sā mātrā sārdhamanekakanyāparivṛtā ratnarathābhirūḍhā drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā niṣkramya
S04bsu016_u:8591_1: tejodhipate rājakumārasya purataḥ tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ parimārgayamāṇā rājājñāniyogādgacchantī
S04bsu016_u:8592_1: mātaraṃ sudarśanāmetadavocat - yatkhalu amba jānīyāḥ - sacenmāṃ tejodhipate rājakumārasya na dāsyasi,
S04bsu016_u:8599: api tu khalu punardārike gaṇikā vayaṃ sarvalokaratikarāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8601: vayaṃ hi rājño dhanapaterājñayā tejodhipateḥ kumārasyopasthānāya niryātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8604_0: tena ceha samayena sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
S04bsu016_u:8604_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu016_u:8606: tatra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:8607: sa tayā dārikayā rathābhirūḍhayaiva pracalāyamānayā svapnāntare dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8608_0: prativibuddhāyāśca purāṇajñātisālohitayā devatayā ārocitam - eṣa dārike sūryagātrapravarastathāgato
S04bsu016_u:8610_0: ākāśadevatā abdevatā jvalanadevatā vāyudevatāḥ sāgaradevatāḥ nadīdevatā parvatadevatā
S04bsu016_u:8610_1: rātridevatā aruṇodgatadevatā vanadevatā vṛkṣadevatā auṣadhidevatāḥ sasyadevatā nagaradevatāḥ
S04bsu016_u:8610_3: sarvadigdevatāśca saṃnipatitāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāyeti //
S04bsu016_u:8611: sā tena tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataguṇaśravaṇena ca viśāradā bhūtvā avakāśapratilabdhā tejodhipate rājakumārasya puratastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:8612: rūpavareṇahu loki viśiṣṭā viśruta sarvadiśāsu guṇebhiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8615: prāṇaśatā bahu naikasahasrā ye mama prekṣiṣu rāgavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:8616: nāpi ca rajyati mahya kumārā kasyacidantiki mānasu loke // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:8617: no ca mama pratihanyati cittaṃ nāpyanunīyati kutraci sattve /
S04bsu016_u:8618: nāpi ca me kvaci vairu na doṣaḥ sarvahite 'bhirataṃ mama cittam // 3 //
S04bsu016_u:8619: yada mi tvamapi dṛṣṭa kumāro rūpabalapravaro guṇadhārī /
S04bsu016_u:8620: tada indriya prīṇita sarve prīta mamo vipulā upajātā // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:8622: subhrulalāṭa sunāsā eṣa nivedayamī tava ātmā // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:8624: purato na virājami tubhyaṃ śyāmakṛtā maṣivigrahatulyā // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:8626: na ca te pratihanyati vācyaṃ agraruta pratigṛhṇami mahyam // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:8627: vadane tava jihva prabhūtā tāmratanū vipulā ratanābhā /
S04bsu016_u:8629: vadane sahitāstava dantā śaṅkhanibhā vimalā suvibhaktā /
S04bsu016_u:8631: smitu yehi vidarśayamānaḥ toṣayase janatāṃ naravīra // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:8632: tava lakṣaṇaśobhana kāyastriṃśa duveva prabhāsura śuddhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8633: samalaṃkṛtu yehi surūpaḥ cakradharo bhavitāsi narendrā // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:8634: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat - kasya tvaṃ dārike,
S04bsu016_u:8636: na mama dārike kalpate paraparigṛhīteṣu dāreṣu mamatāṃ kartum /
S04bsu016_u:8639: pṛcchāmi te brūhi mamaitamarthaṃ parigrahastvaṃ varagātri kasya // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:8640: mātā pitā vā tava kaccidasti bhartāpi vā svāmi parigraho vā /
S04bsu016_u:8641: sattvo 'pi cānyaḥ khalu yena saṃjñā kṛtā mameti tvayi saumyarūpe // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:8642: kaccinna hiṃsābhirataṃ manaste harasyadattaṃ khalu mā pareṣām /
S04bsu016_u:8643: mā kāmamithyācaraṇe ratiste mā vā mṛṣādya prasṛtaṃ manaste // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:8644: mā mitrabhedaprasṛtā matiste mā marmabhedīni vacāṃsi vakṣi /
S04bsu016_u:8645: mā te 'parakṣeṣu dhaneṣvabhidhyā vyāpādacittaṃ janatāsu cāpi // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:8646: mā dṛṣṭikāntārapathi sthitāsi mā karmavaṃśoddhuracetanā vā /
S04bsu016_u:8647: māyāvinī śāṭhyavaśānugā vā mā bādhase tvaṃ viṣameṇa lokam // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:8650: daridrabhūteṣu ca saṃgrahāya kaccitpradātuṃ prasṛtaṃ manaste // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:8651: premāsti kalyāṇasuhṛtsvatho vā dharmeṇa kāle ca vadanti ye tvām /
S04bsu016_u:8652: kāyasya cittasya ca kalyatāṃ te karmaṇyatāṃ vā janayanti samyak // 17 //
S04bsu016_u:8653: buddheṣu te gauravamasti kaccit premāpi vā buddhasuteṣu tīvram /
S04bsu016_u:8655: kaccitpare tiṣṭhasi dharmavaṃśe na cāpyadharmaṃ carituṃ matiste /
S04bsu016_u:8656: anantavarṇe ca guṇārṇave te kaccitparaṃ prema ca gauravaṃ ca // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:8658: āpāyike karmaṇi ca pravṛttā kaccidbhṛśārtā karuṇāyase tvam // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:8659: pareṣu saṃpattimudīkṣya cāgrāṃ kaccitparāṃ tuṣṭimupaiṣi ca tvam /
S04bsu016_u:8662: kalpānanantān caramāṇa caryāṃ kaccinna te prārthanayāsti khedaḥ // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:8663_0: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo dārikāyā mātā tejodhipatiṃ
S04bsu016_u:8663_1: rājakumārametadavocat - mamaiṣā kumāra dārikā upapādukā padmagarbhasaṃbhūtā nābhiniṣkrāntapūrvā gṛhāt /
S04bsu016_u:8665: māṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ śṛṇu rājaputra yaddārikā te paripṛcchateyam /
S04bsu016_u:8666: vakṣye 'nupūrvyā tava dārikeyaṃ jātā yathā saumya vivardhitā ca // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:8668: niśākṣaye yatra bhavān prasūtaḥ tatraiva jātā mama dārikeyam /
S04bsu016_u:8671: sālaprabhodyānavare madīye ciraṃ mayā tatra vinirgatāham // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:8675: vicitraratnāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ gīte ca vādye ca suśikṣitābhiḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:8681: āsaṃstadā saṃśayitā janaughā rātryāṃ kimabhyudgata eṣa sūryaḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:8686: na karmaṇo hyasti kṛtasya nāśaḥ pūrve sucīrṇasya vipāka eṣaḥ // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:8692: rutaṃ ca divyaṃ madhuraṃ ruvatyā gandho mukhādvāti yathotpalasya // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:8693: smitaṃ yadaiṣā prakaroti caiva divyaṃ tadā tūryaravaṃ virauti /

S04bsu016_u:8929: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatirnāma rājaputro 'bhūt?

S04bsu016_u:8933: sa ca sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8934: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya pitā?
S04bsu016_u:8936: ratnakusumaprabho nāma tathāgatastena kālena tena samayena dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt,
S04bsu016_u:8937_0: ya etarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātau sāgaraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:8938: tena ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvadharmadhātugaganapratibhāsamegho lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:8939: yāvantaśca tasmin lokadhātusamudre tathāgatā utpannāśca utpadyante ca utpatsyante ca,
S04bsu016_u:8940: te sarve ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāścaratā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitāḥ //
S04bsu016_u:8941: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya mātā caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhānām?
S04bsu016_u:8943_0: eṣā sā kulaputra māyādevī bhagavato mātā bodhisattvajananī samantāvabhāsānāvaraṇavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā
S04bsu016_u:8943_2: tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājño dhanateragramahiṣyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8944: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikā abhūt?
S04bsu016_u:8946: eṣā sā sunetrā nāma daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya bhāryā mama mātā tena kālena tena samayena sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8947: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma gaṇikādārikābhūt?
S04bsu016_u:8949: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrgaṇikādārikā abhūt /
S04bsu016_u:8950: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipate rājñaḥ parivāro 'bhūt?
S04bsu016_u:8953: sa khalu kulaputra sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastejodhipatinā cakravartinā ca mayā ca yāvajjīvamupasthito 'bhūt cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:8954: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ tasyāmeva lokadhātau prasannagātro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:8956: tasyānantaraṃ sarvagātrajñānapratibhāsacandro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
S04bsu016_u:9008: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyutpannāni [Gv_332] abhūvan,
S04bsu016_u:9010: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra ṣaṣṭerbuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvapaścimo vipuladharmādhimuktisaṃbhavatejo nāma tathāgata utpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9011_0: tasya bhagavato nagare praviṣṭasya mayā rājabhāryābhūtayā sārdhaṃ svāminā sarvākārapūjāmukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9011_1: prayuktayā tathāgatapūjayā pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvatathāgatotpattisaṃbhavapradīpo nāma tathāgatadharmaparyāyastasya
S04bsu016_u:9014: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra etaṃ vimokṣaṃ bhāvayamānā buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpānāgatān bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇā /
S04bsu016_u:9015: teṣu ca me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu anantamadhyāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9020: na ca me jātu bodhisattvasya kāyo jñātaḥ - kiṃpramāṇaḥ kīdṛksaṃsthānaḥ kīdṛgvarṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9021: na kāyakarma jñātaṃ na vākkarma na manaskarma jñātaṃ na jñānadarśanaṃ na jñānagocaraṃ na jñānasamādhiviṣayo jñātaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9022: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasyāntike 'nunayacittamutpādayāmāsuḥ,
S04bsu016_u:9024: sarve te bodhisattvena laukikalokottarairvividhairupāyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya parivārā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu016_u:9025: te bodhisattvasya bodhisattvacaryāṃ carataḥ parivārasaṃvāse na avaivartikā bhavanti sma anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S04bsu016_u:9027: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu tathāgatā utpannāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:9028: sarve te mayā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ pūjitā upasthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9029: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanā śrutā, śrutvā udgṛhītā saṃdhāritā /
S04bsu016_u:9030_0: sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādeṣa vimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānānayairvā
S04bsu016_u:9033_0: ākāśatalapraveśāpramāṇā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ
S04bsu016_u:9034: tathāgataviṣayasamaśarīrā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ //
S04bsu016_u:9035: sā ahaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetraparmāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvaśarīraṃ prekṣamāṇā atṛptaiva darśanena /
S04bsu016_u:9036_0: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ekāntarāgacaritayoḥ strīpuruṣayoranyonyasamāgame saṃketakṛtayorapramāṇā
S04bsu016_u:9037_0: evameva kulaputra mama bodhisattvasya śarīraṃ prekṣamāṇāyā ekaikasmādromavivarādanantamadhyāpramāṇanirdeśā
S04bsu016_u:9039: nānābodhimaṇḍālaṃkārā nānādharmacakrapravartanavikurvitā nānāsūtrāntanirghoṣavikurvitāḥ apratisrabdhayogena praticittakṣaṇaṃ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu016_u:9051_0: sā ahaṃ kulaputra teṣu buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu bodhisattvasya
S04bsu016_u:9053: na pratilabdhapūrvaṃ pratilabhe yāvadantaḥpuramadhyagatasyāpyahaṃ kulaputra sarvārthasiddhasya strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvimokṣanayasāgarāvatāraiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9059: ihaiva bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūle vividharatnavyūhamahāmaṇirājapadmagarbhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvajanetrī māyā nāma devī /
S04bsu016_u:9060: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto 'nupaliptā bhavanti sarvalokadharmamalaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9070: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etameva vimokṣamukhanayaṃ saṃdarśayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:9072: prasannacittāḥ pratighātino vā vrajanti te saṃgrahamasya sarve // 90 //
S04bsu016_u:9073: yāvanti hi kṣetraśate rajāṃsi smarāmi kalpāniha tāvato 'ham /
S04bsu016_u:9080: śūrāṇi vīrāṇyatha rūpavanti pañcābhavan putraśatāni tasya /
S04bsu016_u:9082: rājā saputraḥ sugate prasannaḥ pūjāmakārṣīdvipulāṃ jinasya /
S04bsu016_u:9086: rājyaṃ parityajya nṛṇāṃ sa pañcakoṭīvṛtaḥ pravrajitastadānīm /
S04bsu016_u:9087: sa pravrajitvā dṛḍhavīryayuktaḥ saṃdhārayāmāsa jinasya dharmam // 97 //
S04bsu016_u:9092: piṇḍāya dhīmān sa puraṃ viveśa prāsādikeryāpathaśāntaveṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9095: tasyāhamāsaṃ duhitā manāpā bhānuprabhā nāma sucārurūpā // 101 //
S04bsu016_u:9099: yadā gṛhadvāragato mamābhūt pātre pradatto 'sya maṇistadā me /
S04bsu016_u:9102: ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni nāgāṃ kalpottamāyāṃ khalu jātvapāyān // 104 //
S04bsu016_u:9103: deveṣu devendrakuleṣu jātā narendraputrī manujeṣu cāham /
S04bsu016_u:9108: ātmānamasyaiva nivedayitvā bhūtāsmi vaśyā khalu tasya bhāryā // 107 //
S04bsu016_u:9109: saṃpūjitastena mayā sahābhūt sa sūryagātrapravaro maharṣiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9110: prasannayā caiva tamīkṣya buddhamutpāditaṃ me varabodhicittam // 108 //
S04bsu016_u:9111: pūrṇā jinānāṃ khalu ṣaṣṭikoṭyastatraiva kalpe susamutthitānām /
S04bsu016_u:9119: dṛṣṭvā manasteṣu na sajjate me kliṣṭeṣu naiva pratihanyate ca // 112 //
S04bsu016_u:9120: kṣetreṣu teṣveva ca bodhimaṇḍe paśyāmi buddhān nikhileṣvaśeṣān /
S04bsu016_u:9124: caryāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāṃ dharemi bhūmīnayāṃścāvatarāmyaśeṣān /
S04bsu016_u:9126: saṃprekṣatī satpuruṣasya kāyaṃ kalpānanantāṃścaratī ca caryām /
S04bsu016_u:9134: dharmābhidhānairjanatāṃ vinītāṃ teṣveva paśyāmi jinān prayuktān // 119 //
S04bsu016_u:9135: na kāyakarmāsya mayāvabuddhaṃ na vāgna cittaṃ na tayośca karma /
S04bsu016_u:9136: ṛddhirna naivāsya pṛthagvikurvā kalpāṃścarantyā vipulāṃ sucaryām // 120 //
S04bsu016_u:9137_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya gopāṃ
S04bsu016_u:9137_1: śākyakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā
S04bsu016_u:9140_0: atha khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya māyāyā devyāḥ sakāśaṃ gamanābhimukhasya buddhagocaravicārajñānapratipannasya
S04bsu016_u:9144_3: darśanamārāgayituṃ saṃmukhībhāvatāmanuprāptuṃ samavadhānaṃ cāptuṃ nimittaṃ codgrahītuṃ
S04bsu016_u:9144_4: ghoṣamaṇḍalaṃ vā vijñātuṃ mantravyavacārān vā ājñātumanuśāsanīṃ codgrahītum //
S04bsu016_u:9145_0: tamevaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayuktaṃ ratnanetrā nāma nagaradevatā gaganadevatāgaṇaparivṛtā
S04bsu016_u:9175: evaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhyabhiyuktena te kulaputra bodhisattvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalasamārjanamanuprāptum /
S04bsu016_u:9177_0: tathā hi bodhisattvasya evaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhasya sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhante
S04bsu016_u:9177_1: buddhadarśanāvaraṇaṃ vā dharmaśravaṇāvaraṇaṃ vā tathāgatapūjopasthānāvaraṇaṃ vā sattvasaṃgrahaprayogāvaraṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9178: sarvāvaraṇavigatena hi kulaputra cittādhyāśayena kalyāṇamitraparyeṣṭyabhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya alpakṛcchreṇa kalyāṇamitrāṇyābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu016_u:9180_1: māyāyā devyā varṇamudīrayamāṇā bodhimaṇḍānniṣkramya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyābhimukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9181_0: tāni vipulāni kṣetrāṇyavabhāsya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya sarvatrānugataṃ samantābhimukhaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9181_1: sarvatathāgatakāyaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
S04bsu016_u:9184: atha tāvadeva virajaḥprabhāsaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe,
S04bsu016_u:9186: vitimiraṃ ca nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe, yena sattvasvabhāvamavatarati /
S04bsu016_u:9187: [Gv_341] virajaḥpatiṃ ca nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe, yena ca sarvadharmasvabhāvamaṇḍalaṃ vyavalokayati /
S04bsu016_u:9188: viśuddhagatiṃ ca nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe, yena sarvakṣetraprakṛtiṃ vyavalokayati /
S04bsu016_u:9189: vairocanaprabhaṃ ca nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe, yena tathāgatadharmaśarīraṃ vyavalokayati /
S04bsu016_u:9190: viśuddhagatiṃ ca nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe, yenācintyāṃ tathāgatarūpakāyapariniṣpattiṃ vyavalokayati /
S04bsu016_u:9199: samantadarśaṃ ca nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe, yena sarvakṣetrasamutpattiprasṛtaṃ
S04bsu016_u:9201_0: atha khalu sunetro nāma rākṣasendro bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadvārapālo daśānāṃ rākṣasasahasrāṇāṃ
S04bsu016_u:9201_1: pramukhaḥ sabhāryaḥ saputraḥ sasvajanaparivāraḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ nānāvarṇamanojñagandhaiḥ
S04bsu016_u:9201_2: kusumairabhyavakīrya evamāha - daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva
S04bsu016_u:9213: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva āsanno bhavati sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:9214: daśabhiśca samādhinidhyaptimukhairvyavalokayan bodhisattvaḥ saṃmukhībhāvaṃ pratilabhate sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:9231: evamukte sunetreṇa rākṣasendreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gaganatalamavalokya evamāha - sādhu sādhu ārya,
S04bsu016_u:9237_0: āha - tena hi kulaputra samantadikpraṇipatitena śarīreṇa sarvārambaṇena kalyāṇamitrasmṛtyupanibaddhenāśayena
S04bsu016_u:9237_1: samantanirjavena samādhyanugamena svapnopamena cittajavena pratibhāsopamena manaḥśarīravicāragamanena
S04bsu016_u:9238_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yathānuśiṣṭaḥ sunetreṇa rākṣasendreṇa pratipadyamāno
S04bsu016_u:9239_0: tasyāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmakarkaṭikāyāṃ dharmadhātudiksamavasaraṇagarbhaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramapaśyaccitraṃ
S04bsu016_u:9279: adhiṣṭhānena rūpeṇa, saṃsārāvinivṛttiparameṇa viśuddhena rūpeṇa tathatāsamanirvikalpena /
S04bsu016_u:9280: ityevaṃprakāreṇa rūpeṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmadrākṣīdarūpeṇa rūpapratibhāsena avedanena rūpeṇa lokaduḥkhavedanāpraśāntiparameṇa,
S04bsu016_u:9289_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrūpasaṃjñāpagataḥ parasattvāśayānavataran
S04bsu016_u:9292: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yatpramāṇā māyādevī tatpramāṇaṃ svakāyamadhiṣṭhāya samantadigabhimukhāṃ māyādevīṃ sarvatrānugatena kāyena praṇipatitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9294_0: sa tāni samādhimukhāni vyavalokya animittīkṛtvā prabhāvayitvā sārīkṛtvā anusmṛtya
S04bsu016_u:9294_1: spharitvā prasaritvā avalokayitvā vipulīkṛtvā abhinirhṛtya mudrayitvā tebhyaḥ samādhimukhebhyo
S04bsu016_u:9294_2: vyutthāya [Gv_345] māyādevīṃ saparivārāṃ sabhavanāsanāṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ
S04bsu016_u:9294_3: sthitvā evamāha - ahamārye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya
S04bsu016_u:9296: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ pariniṣpanno bhavati sarvajñatāyām /
S04bsu016_u:9297: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
S04bsu016_u:9298_0: sāhaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā yāvanti iha lokadhātusamudre bhagavato
S04bsu016_u:9299: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ caramabhavikānāṃ bodhisattvānāmahaṃ jananī /
S04bsu016_u:9300: sarve te bodhisattvā mama kukṣau saṃbhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:9302_0: ihaiva tāvadahaṃ kulaputra bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ kapilavastuni mahānagare rājñaḥ
S04bsu016_u:9302_1: śuddhodanasya kulabaddhakalpena siddhārthaṃ bodhisattvaṃ janitravatī mahatācintyena
S04bsu016_u:9303: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tadā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhagatā bhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:9304_3: lokadhātumavabhāsya mama śarīre nipatya mūrdhānamupādāya sarvaromakūpeṣvanuprāviśan /
S04bsu016_u:9306: atha tāvadeva mama kāye bodhisattvaraśmimukhamaṇḍalābhivijñaptāḥ sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitanayavyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma antargatena parivāreṇa /
S04bsu016_u:9308: atha tāvadeva yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvaraśmimukhamaṇḍalāni vijñaptāni janmanayavikurvitāni pravartante,
S04bsu016_u:9310: yaduta bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatā buddhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalaparivṛtā lokendrābhipūjitā dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9311: ye ca taistathāgataiḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhistathāgatā ārāgitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:9314: yāni ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nirmāṇamaṇḍalāni praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti,
S04bsu016_u:9316: tasyā mama kulaputra kāye tābhirbodhisattvaraśmibhiranupraviṣṭābhiḥ sarvajagadabhyudgataḥ kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S04bsu016_u:9320: te sarve mama kāye 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ sarve saṃdṛśyante //

S04bsu016_u:9324: te sarve mama kukṣau trisāhasralokadhātuvipulena yāvadanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuvipulena ākramavikrameṇa anuvicaranti sma /

S04bsu016_u:9325_1: praticittakṣaṇamanabhilāpyāni mama kukṣau samavasaranti sma bodhisattvagarbhāvāsavikurvitaṃ draṣṭum /

S04bsu016_u:9332: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpe bodhisattvaṃ kukṣiṇā saṃpratīcchāmi,
S04bsu016_u:9333: evaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikājambudvīpeṣu saṃpratīcchāmi anena ca vikurvitavyūhena /
S04bsu016_u:9334: na cāyaṃ mama kāyo dvayībhavati nādvayībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:9336: yathāpi nāma tadasyaiva mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya subhāṣitatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:9337: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asya bhagavato vairocanasya mātā abhūvam,
S04bsu016_u:9339: yatra bodhisattvo loka upapāduka upāpadyata padmagarbhe,
S04bsu016_u:9343: yatra buddhakṣetre prādurbhavati, tatrāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍadevatā bhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:9344: iti hi kulaputra yāvadbhirupāyamukhaiścaramabhavikā bodhisattvā loka upapattiṃ saṃdarśayanti,
S04bsu016_u:9346: yathā ahaṃ kulaputra iha lokadhātau asya bhagavataḥ sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśaneṣu janetryabhūvam,
S04bsu016_u:9350: tathā sarveṣāṃ bhadrakalpikānāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ janetrī bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:9351_0: tadyathā maitreyasya bodhisattvasya tuṣitabhavanagatasya cyutisaṃdarśanakāle pravṛtte
S04bsu016_u:9351_2: prabhāsiteṣu sarvadharmadhātunayataleṣu yāvanti mama dharmadhātunayatalāni cakṣuṣo
S04bsu016_u:9352: yeṣu maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena manuṣyaloke manuṣyendrakuleṣu janmopapattisaṃdarśanena sattvā vinayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:9356_0: tathā pradyotasya ketoḥ sunetrasya kusumasya kusumaśriyaḥ tiṣyasya puṣyasya sumanaso

S04bsu016_u:9357_4: bhīṣmayaśaso raśmimukhasya śālendraskadhasya yaśasaḥ auṣadhirājasya ratnavarasya

S04bsu016_u:9357_6: mahāsanārciṣo mohadharmeśvarasya nihatadhīrasya devaśuddhasya dṛḍhaprabhasya viśvāmitrasya

S04bsu016_u:9360: tathā daśasu dikṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu anantamadhyān dharmadhātunayānavataramāṇā yathā ca maitreyasya tathāgatasya anabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣairjananī bhaviṣyāmi,
S04bsu016_u:9361: evamanabhilāpyaguṇaviśeṣaiḥ siṃhasya evaṃ yāvadrocamasya tathāgatasya jananī bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu016_u:9365: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayā ayamārye mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:9367: tasmin khalu punaḥ śubhaprabhe kalpe merūdgataśrīrnāma lokadhāturabhūdviśuddhasaṃkliṣṭānekaratnamayī sacakravālasumerusāgarā pañcagatipracārā citrā darśanīyā /
S04bsu016_u:9368: tasyāṃ khalu merūdgataśriyāṃ lokadhātau daśa cāturdvīpikakoṭīśatānyabhūvan /
S04bsu016_u:9369: teṣāṃ khalu daśānāṃ cāturdvīpikakoṭīśatānāṃ madhye siṃhadhvajāgratejo nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt,
S04bsu016_u:9371: teṣāṃ khalu aśītīnāṃ rājadhānīkotīśatānāṃ madhye dhvajāgravatī nāma madhyamarājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9373: tasyāṃ khalu punardhvajāgravatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ citramañjariprabhāso nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9375: tasmin khalu punaścitramañjariprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe vimaladhvajo nāma bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt sarvajñatādharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:9376: tasya sarvajñatādharmādhigamāntarāyāya suvarṇaprabho nāma māro mahāsainyaparivāro 'ntardhitakāya upakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9378: sa tato mahāsainyādvipulataramugrataraṃ ca mahāntaṃ balakāyamabhinirmāya taṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ samantādanuparivārayāmāsa mārasainyaparājayāya /
S04bsu016_u:9380: tena ca bhagavatā vimaladhvajena tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā /
S04bsu016_u:9381_0: atha khalu netraśrībodhimaṇḍadevatā mahātejaḥparākramasya cakravartino 'ntike putrasaṃjñāmutpādya
S04bsu016_u:9381_1: tasya tathāgatasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya praṇidhānamakārṣīt - yatra yatrāhaṃ bhagavan utpadyeyam,
S04bsu016_u:9382: tatra tatraiṣa me mahātejaḥparākramaścakravartī putro bhavet /
S04bsu016_u:9383: yadā caiṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta, tadāpyahametasya jananī bhaveyam /
S04bsu016_u:9384: saivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasminneva citramañjariprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe tasminneva śubhaprabhe kalpe daśa nayutāni tathāgatānāmārāgayāmāsa //
S04bsu016_u:9385: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena netraśrīrnāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūt?
S04bsu016_u:9386: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu016_u:9387: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena netraśrīrnāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:9388_0: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahātejaḥparākramo
S04bsu016_u:9390: ayaṃ sa bhagavān vairocanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena mahātejaḥparākramo nāma rājā cakravartyabhūt /
S04bsu016_u:9391: sā ahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya yatratatropapannāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:9392_0: sarvatra eṣa mama putratvamupāgataḥ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran sarvagatimukheṣu
S04bsu016_u:9393: yatra yatropapadyate sattvaparipākahetoḥ, sarvatra ahamevāsya jananyabhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:9394: carame ca bhave 'sya ahameva sarvatrānugatā jananyabhūvam /
S04bsu016_u:9398: pratyutpannānāmapi daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāmaparimāṇānāṃ tathāgatānāmahameva jananītvaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
S04bsu016_u:9399: yāvatāṃ ca tathāgatānāmahaṃ carame bhave bodhisattvamātā abhūvam,
S04bsu016_u:9400: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo raśmayo niścaritvā mahākāyamāsanaṃ cāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9402_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ mahākaruṇāgarbhāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvajñatāparipākavinayāparitṛptakukṣīṇāṃ

S04bsu016_u:9410: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena tridaśendrabhavanaṃ yena ca surendrābhā devakanyā smṛtimato devaputrasya duhitā, tenopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:9411_0: upetya surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya surendrābhāṃ devakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ

S04bsu016_u:9412: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /

S04bsu016_u:9416: sā ahaṃ kulaputra abhijānāmi - utpalako nāma kalpo 'bhūt /

S04bsu016_u:9420: tatsarvaṃ prathamacittotpādāya yāvatsaddharmaparyantaniṣṭhaṃ prajānāmi smarāmi anusmarāmi dhārayāmi saṃdhārayāmi upadhārayāmi anusarāmi /
S04bsu016_u:9423: subhago nāma kalpo 'bhūttatra me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9425: suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt tatra me jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:9427: uttaptaśrīrnāma kalpobhūt, tatra me gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:9429: jayaṃgamo nāma kalpo 'bhūt, tatra me ṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:9430: sucandro nāma kalpo 'bhūt, tatra me saptatirgaṅgānadīvālukāsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /

S04bsu016_u:9433: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādayamasaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ śrutaḥ /

S04bsu016_u:9438_0: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vigatatamondhakārāṇāṃ saṃsārarātriprabhāvitānāṃ [Gv_351]

S04bsu016_u:9455_2: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /

S04bsu016_u:9460: tasya me kulaputra mātṛkāṃ vācayamānasya akāramakṣaraṃ parikīrtayato bodhisattvānubhāvena asaṃbhinnaviṣayaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitāmukhamavakrāntam /
S04bsu016_u:9489: chakāraṃ parikīrtayata upacayagarbhaprayogaṃ cāritracchatramaṇḍalabhedaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitāmukhamavakrāntam /

S04bsu016_u:9895: tasmāttarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇyupasaṃkramitavyāni pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhāravahanāpariṇamanatayā /

S04bsu016_u:10020: evaṃ jñānapraveśābhinirhṛtena saṃjñāmanasikāreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako [Gv_370] vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya purastāt praṇipātitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10035: ye te lokaniketoccalitāśca sarvajagadbhavaneṣu saṃdṛśyante sarvasattvaparipācanāya /
S04bsu016_u:10036: ye te sarvakṣetrāniśritāśca sarvakṣetreṣu ca anuvicaranti tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:10037: ye te sarvakṣetrāṇi ca anuvicaranti sarvabuddhakṣetravyūhaparigrahaṇatāyai, na ca sthānādvicaranti /
