S04bsu016_u:10043: ye te sarvalokadhātvantargatakāyā na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10048: ye te sarvanimittāpagatavihāriṇaśca, na ca śrāvakaniyāmamavakrāmanti /
S04bsu016_u:10049: ye te sarvadharmānutpādavihāravihāriṇaśca, na ca anutpādadharmatāyāṃ patanti /
S04bsu016_u:10053: ye te maitrīvihāravihāriṇaśca, na ca doṣamalopagatacittāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10056: ye te caturdhyānavihāriṇaśca, na ca dhyānavaśenopapadyante /
S04bsu016_u:10057: ye te caturapramāṇavihāravihāriṇaśca, na ca rūpadhātugatiṃ gacchanti sarvasattvaparipācanārtham /
S04bsu016_u:10062: ye te mahopekṣāvihāravihāriṇaśca, na ca sattvadhātuṃ parityajanti /
S04bsu016_u:10063: ye te śūnyatāvihāravihāriṇaśca, na ca dṛṣṭigatasaṃniśritāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10066: ye te sarvakarmakleśavaśavartinaśca, sattvaparipākāya ca karmakleśavaśānugāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:10067: ye te cyutyupapattiparijñātāvinaśca, janmacyutimaraṇaṃ ca saṃdarśayanti /
S04bsu016_u:10068: ye te sarvagativyativṛttāśca, sarvagatiṣu ca gacchanti sarvavinayavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:10074: ye te sarvopapattyaniśritavihāriṇaśca, na ca bhūtakoṭīsākṣātkaraṇavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10075: ye te trivimokṣavihāriṇaśca, na ca śrāvakavimuktisparśavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10076: ye te caturāryasatyavyavalokanavihāriṇaśca, na ca phalasākṣātkaraṇavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10079: ye te pṛthagjanabhūmisamatikrāntavihāriṇaśca, na ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipatanavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10082: ye te caturmārapathasamatikrāntavihāriṇaśca, na ca mārakalpanavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10084: ye te tathatāvihāriṇaśca, na ca bhūtakoṭyāyatanavihāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10086: na ca mahāyānacyavanavihāriṇaḥ teṣāmayaṃ sarvaguṇavihāriṇāṃ vihāraḥ //
S04bsu016_u:10087: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:10088: iha so mahākaruṇa lābhi viśuddhabuddhirmaitreya maitraśiri lokahitābhiyuktaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10090: abhiṣekabhūmisthita jyeṣṭhasuto jinānāṃ viharāti buddhaviṣayaṃ anucintayantaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:10091: sarveṣa yo jinasutāna mahāyaśānāṃ mahājñānagocara vimokṣapratiṣṭhitānām /
S04bsu016_u:10092: ye dharmadhātu vicaranti asajjamānā āvāsu teṣamayamapratipudgalānām // 2 //
S04bsu016_u:10098: na karonti niśrayu kvacidgagane va pakṣī teṣāṃ vihāru ayu jñānaviśāradānām // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:10099: ye rāgadoṣamatha mohasvabhāva jñātvā saṃkalpahetujanitāṃ vitathapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:10100: nirvikalpayanti ca virāgamayīha teṣāṃ śāntapraśāntyumagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 6 //
S04bsu016_u:10102: praparīkṣamāṇa na patanti vidū praśāntiprajñāupāyakuśalānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 7 //
S04bsu016_u:10103: ye te anāvaraṇajñānadiśaṃ praviṣṭā jinakṣetra sattvaparikalpavikalpaśāntā /
S04bsu016_u:10104: bhāvasvabhāvarahitā na vimṛṣanti dharmān āvāsu teṣamaya śāntiparāyaṇānām // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:10105: ye te asaṅgacaritā ima dharmadhātuṃ vicaranti bhāvavigatā khagavāyubhūtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10108: ye dṛṣṭidurgatigatāṃ janatāmakhinnāṃ duḥkhāntarāṃ kaṭuka vedana vedayantīm /
S04bsu016_u:10109: maitraprabhāya śamayanti apāya sarvān āvāsu teṣamaya maitrakṛpāśayānām // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:10111: ye prekṣya lokamiha mokṣapathe praṇenti sārthātivāhasadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 11 //
S04bsu016_u:10115: parimocayanti vipulāṃ karuṇāṃ janitvā mahavaidyarājadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:10116: ye te niśāmya janatāṃ dukhitāmatrāṇāṃ śokākare patita mṛtyusamudragāmi /
S04bsu016_u:10117: tārenti kṛva mahatīṃ śubhadharmanāvaṃ teṣāṃ vihāramaya dāśasutopamānām // 14 //
S04bsu016_u:10126: yatha eki sattvi tatha sarvajagatyaśeṣam āvāsu teṣamaya lokaparāyaṇānām // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:10127: ye ekakṣetraprasare aparāntakalpān vicaranti cārika jagārthamakhinnavīryāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10128: yatha ekakṣetri tatha sarvadaśaddiśāsu āvāsu teṣamaya vajradṛḍhāśayānām // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:10129: ye dharmamegha sugatāna daśaddiśāsu ekāsane sthita pibanti asaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10131: ye kṣetrasāgara vrajanti anābhilāpyān praviśanti co pariṣasāgara nāyakānām /
S04bsu016_u:10132: ye pūjasāgara vicitra jine karonti teṣāmasaṅgacaraṇānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:10134: bahukalpasāgara caranti jagaddhitārthā teṣāṃ vihāru ayu sarvaguṇākarāṇām // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:10135: ye eki vālapathi uttaramāna kṣetrāt buddhāṃśca sattva tatha kalpa anantamadhyān /
S04bsu016_u:10136: praviśanti enta na punā ca upenti sīmāṃ teṣāmasaṅganayanānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:10137: ye ekacittakṣaṇi kalpamahāsamudrān praviśanti kṣetra tatha buddhajagatpracārān /
S04bsu016_u:10140: ye sarvakṣetraparamāṇurajān gaṇitvā bindupramāṇa tulayitva jalaugha sarvam /
S04bsu016_u:10143: abhinirharanti vicaranti anantakalpān iha te praviṣṭa sugatāna sutāḥ smṛtīmāḥ // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:10144: iha te sthitā jinasutā vividhā vicitrā abhinirharanti bahuśāstrakathārthayuktāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10145: saukhyāvahāni jagatāmiha śilpasthānānyanucintayanta viharanti satāṃ vihāraḥ // 27 //
S04bsu016_u:10146: iha te sthitā mahaabhijñaupāyajñāne yāvanta sattvagatibheda daśaddiśāsu /
S04bsu016_u:10147: sarvatra janmacyutibheda vidarśayanti māyāgate sthita vimokṣa asaṅgacaryāḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:10148: iha te sthitā prathamacittasamudbhavādyāṃ darśenti dharmacaryāṃ vasudharmaniṣṭhām /
S04bsu016_u:10150: ye ekacittaprasareṇa vibuddha bodhiṃ praviśanti jñānamatikarma anantamadhyā /
S04bsu016_u:10151: saṃmohaketvavraji loku ya cintayāna evaṃ durāsadagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 30 //
S04bsu016_u:10158: iha te kṛpāśayamatī sthitvā jagadīkṣya duḥkhaśokahatam /
S04bsu016_u:10163: iha te sthitā jinasutāḥ sarvajinānāṃ ca pādamūleṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10167: iha te praviṣṭa śūrāḥ sarvaṃ jinagocaraṃ tulayamānā /
S04bsu016_u:10181: iha sarvakṣetrasaṃkhyāṃ kalpānāṃ caiva dharmasaṃkhyāṃ ca /
S04bsu016_u:10183: iha te sthitā jinasutā yāvat kṣetrāstriyadhvasaṃkhyātāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10185: iha te sthitā jinānāṃ caryāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca indriyaṃ jagatām /
S04bsu016_u:10194: sthitveha sattvasamatāṃ dharmeṣu buddhasamatāṃ ca prekṣya /
S04bsu016_u:10197: vimṛṣantyapare dharmāniha te bhavanavare sthitā dhīrāḥ // 52 //
S04bsu016_u:10199: śakyā mayā hi vaktuṃ vistīrṇo 'nantu buddhīnām // 53 //
S04bsu016_u:10204_1: ca apramāṇairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭutya vanditvā namaskṛtya praṇipatya udvīkṣa
S04bsu016_u:10206: dṛṣṭvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena maitreyo bodhisattvastenābhimukho bhūtvā dūrata eva maitreyasya bodhisattvasya sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatitaḥ //
S04bsu016_u:10207: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ vyavalokya sarvaparṣado dakṣiṇena hastenopadarśya bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃvarṇayan gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu016_u:10211: svāgataṃ praśamaśāntilocana mā kilāmyasi carantu cārikām // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:10214: ehi svāgatamalīnaindriyā mā kilāmyāsi carantu sūrata // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:10216: sarvamitrabhajanāya prasthitā svāgataṃ ti acalā dṛḍhavratā // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:10217: svāgataṃ śubhapathena āgatā svāgataṃ guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitā /
S04bsu016_u:10218: svāgataṃ jinapathena prasthitā mā śramaṃ kila samarthasva kvacit // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:10219: ehi svāgatu guṇeṣu tanmayā svāgataṃ ti kuśalāni(bhi)syandita(?) /
S04bsu016_u:10220: sādhu svāgatamanantagocarā darśanaṃ tava sudurlabhaṃ jage // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:10224: krodharoṣavigatā anunnata sādhu te darśanaṃ sudarśanam // 63 //
S04bsu016_u:10231: ehi sarvajinaputrapreṣita darśayāmi ti anāvṛtāṃ diśam // 66 //
S04bsu016_u:10234: eṣamāṇu sugatāna gocaraṃ mārgamāṇu virajāna cārikām /
S04bsu016_u:10236: yatra śikṣita atīta nāyakāḥ śikṣiṣenti tatha ye anāgatāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10237: tiṣṭhatāṃ ca sugatāna yā carī pṛcchamāṇu ayu tāmihāgataḥ // 69 //
S04bsu016_u:10240: bodhisattva mama buddhivardhikā buddhaputra mama bodhidāyakāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10241: eti mitra mama buddhavarṇitā evacittakuśalo ihāgataḥ // 71 //
S04bsu016_u:10250: nāyakā mama sukhaṃdadā ime evacitta ayu mitra sevate // 75 //
S04bsu016_u:10252: sarvadurgatiapāyaśodhakā eti mitra mama sādhu darśakāḥ // 76 //
S04bsu016_u:10254: eti sarvajinaguhyadhārakā eva mitra bhajateṣa paṇḍitaḥ // 77 //
S04bsu016_u:10257: paśyathā ayamudāraāśayaḥ sevamāna ima mitra paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10258: yādṛśīṃ pratijaneti sūrata eva yūyamanuśikṣatho sadā // 79 //
S04bsu016_u:10260: anuśāsti ayu tasya kurvato paśyathā kathamaṭatyakhedavān // 80 //
S04bsu016_u:10261: eṣa sarvasukhasaukhya ujjhiya utsṛjitva amaropamaṃ gṛham /
S04bsu016_u:10264: eṣa āśaya viśodhya paṇḍitaḥ svāśrayaṃ jahiya mānuṣaṃ imam /
S04bsu016_u:10275: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagatāṃ bhaviṣyati // 87 //
S04bsu016_u:10294: durlabho jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ // 96 //
S04bsu016_u:10308: eṣa lokaśaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ eṣa sarvajagati prabhākaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10315: yādṛśaṃ tava prayoga sūrataḥ śraddha yādṛśa tavā aninditaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10317: sarvabuddha nacireṇa drakṣyasi sarvakṣetra nacireṇa yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:10318: sarvadharma nacireṇa jñāsyasi tādṛśaṃ ti śubhamātmanā kṛtam // 106 //
S04bsu016_u:10321: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇān bhājanaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi śubhāna saṃbhavaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10322: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi jinaurasaiḥ samo yādṛśaṃ ti adhimuktimaṇḍalam // 108 //
S04bsu016_u:10323: māramaṇḍala parājitaṃ tvayā karmamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ ca te /
S04bsu016_u:10324: kleśamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ tvayā yādṛśaṃ ti praṇidhānamaṇḍalam // 109 //
S04bsu016_u:10333: duḥkhajāla jagu mocayiṣyase tādṛśaḥ praṇidhijālu śodhitaḥ // 113 //
S04bsu016_u:10343: mokṣadvāramupaneṣyase jagat dvāru tādṛśu viśodhitaṃ tvayā // 118 //
S04bsu016_u:10346: bodhimārga tatha tvaṃ anuddhato mārgase dṛḍhamate atandritaḥ // 119 //
S04bsu016_u:10353: kṣetrasāgara bahu pravekṣyasi drakṣyase pariṣasāgarān bahūn /
S04bsu016_u:10359: tvaṃ samādhibhavanaṃ pravekṣyase tvaṃ vimokṣabhavanāni lapsyase /
S04bsu016_u:10367: nocireṇa spharamāṇu paśyase māruto va gagane asaṅgavān // 129 //
S04bsu016_u:10370: maiva kheda janayāhi sūratā tuṣṭi vindi vipulāṃ nirāmiṣam /
S04bsu016_u:10371: yena te imu vimokṣu īdṛśo dṛṣṭu paśyasi ca bhūyu drakṣyase // 131 //
S04bsu016_u:10373: tvaṃ samartha imu dhārituṃ nayaṃ tena paśyasi idaṃ vikurvitam // 132 //
S04bsu016_u:10374: yeṣa kalpanayutaiḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ kutu guṇaprabhāvana /
S04bsu016_u:10375: tehi dṛṣṭa carato sucārikāṃ buddhaputra aniketagocarāḥ // 133 //
S04bsu016_u:10376: lābha bhūya vipulā acintiyā svāgataṃ ca tava mānuṣo bhava /
S04bsu016_u:10377: yena mañjuśiri dṛṣṭa saṃmukhamīdṛśaṃ kṛtu guṇān bhājanam // 134 //
S04bsu016_u:10380: duḥkhadharma tvayi sarva ujjhitāḥ sarvakheda ca vivarjitā bhava // 135 //
S04bsu016_u:10382: jñānabhūmi paripūrya uttamā buddhabhūmi nacireṇa lapsyase // 136 //
S04bsu016_u:10386: ye bhajanti ima mitra īdṛśāḥ te bhavanti nacireṇa nāyakāḥ // 138 //
S04bsu016_u:10387: dṛṣṭva sattva vinayaṃgatā bahu bodhisattvacari citra yāvat /
S04bsu016_u:10388: mā tu jātu vimatiṃ kariṣyase sarvadharmamukha bodhicārikam // 139 //
S04bsu016_u:10390: yena saṃpada imā tvamīdṛśī buddhaputra iha adya paśyasi // 140 //
S04bsu016_u:10391: paśya lābha tava kīdṛśo mahān paśyato jinasutā nirantaram /
S04bsu016_u:10394: tena co jinasutā nirantaraṃ te vimokṣanaya darśayanti mām // 142 //
S04bsu016_u:10395: kalpakoṭinayutāni te janā saṃvasanti sugatātmajaiḥ saha /
S04bsu016_u:10397: te 'pi teṣu na vidanti gocaraṃ nātma tairhi guṇabhājanaṃ kṛtam // 143 //
S04bsu016_u:10398: tvaṃ śṛṇoṣi ima īdṛśaṃ nayaṃ paśyase ca sudurlabhaṃ jage /
S04bsu016_u:10400: sarvabuddha samanvāharanti te bodhisattva tava saṃgrahasthitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10401: tvaṃ ca teṣa anuśāsanisthitaḥ sādhu sūdhana sujīvitaṃ tava // 145 //
S04bsu016_u:10402: bodhisattvakuladharmi vartase śikṣase jinasutāna tvaṃ guṇaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10403: bheṣyase sugatavaṃśavardhanaḥ prīti vindahi udāra sudhanā // 146 //
S04bsu016_u:10404: sarvabuddha pitarastavāsamā bodhisattva tava sarvi bhrātaraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10405: bodhiaṅga tava sarvi jñātayaḥ tvaṃ sujātu sugatāna orasaḥ // 147 //
S04bsu016_u:10407: dharmarājamacireṇa lapsyase sūdhanā tuṣṭa bhava prīṇitendriyaḥ // 148 //
S04bsu016_u:10410: yādṛśaṃ vapati bīja yo naro tādṛśaṃ labhati tasya so phalam /
S04bsu016_u:10411: prīti vinda vipulāmacintiyāṃ eṣa te 'dya samanvāsayāmyaham // 150 //
S04bsu016_u:10413: cīrṇa kalpanayutāna ye carī bodhisattvanayutā acintiyā /
S04bsu016_u:10414: ta 'pi saṃpada labhanti nedṛśīmekajanmi pratilabdha yā tvayā // 151 //
S04bsu016_u:10415: sarvametadiha muktitaḥ phalaṃ āśayasya dṛḍhavīryatāya ca /
S04bsu016_u:10416: yasya cārika bhavediyaṃ priyā so dhareya sudhanasya yā carī // 152 //
S04bsu016_u:10418: sudhana eva samudānitāstvayā nityameṣa hi viśeṣacārikā // 153 //
S04bsu016_u:10421: eṣa bhotu tava darśito tayā bhadranāmacariyāya sūdhana /
S04bsu016_u:10422: eta jñātva sa kadāci bheṣyate sevamāna iha mitra tanmayaḥ // 155 //
S04bsu016_u:10423: kāyakoṭi smara pūrvikā tvayā kāmahetu kṣayitā nirarthakam /
S04bsu016_u:10424: adya bodhiya mārgaṇo hyayaṃ kāya tarjatu vratena suvrataḥ // 156 //
S04bsu016_u:10426: gaṅgavālikasamatā virāgitā buddha no ca śruta īdṛśo nayaḥ // 157 //
S04bsu016_u:10427: so idāni kṣaṇa labdha mānuṣo buddhapādu imu mitru īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10428: śrūyate ca varabodhicārikā viśuddhi na bhaviṣyate katham // 158 //
S04bsu016_u:10430: bhoti bhūya sugatāna saṃbhavo mitradharmaśravaṇaṃ ca śrūyate /
S04bsu016_u:10431: no ca śrūyati ayaṃ punarnayo āśayo yadi na bhoti śodhitaḥ // 159 //
S04bsu016_u:10434: teṣa lābha paramā acintiyāsteṣa mānuṣabhavaḥ suāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10435: yairiyaṃ cari praveśamīdṛśaṃ śrutva eva praṇidhī bhirnirhṛtā // 161 //
S04bsu016_u:10436: tasya sarvi sugatā na durlabhā tasya sarvi jinaputra nārataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10437: tasya bodhayi na bhūyu saṃśayo yena eva adhimukti śodhitā // 162 //
S04bsu016_u:10438: tena sarvi vinayā na varjitāḥ tena sarvadukhadharma ujjhitāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10439: tena sarvaguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ yo imaṃ nayu praviṣṭa īdṛśam // 163 //
S04bsu016_u:10440: nocireṇa imu kāyu ujjhiyā buddhakṣetra pariśuddha yāsyasi /
S04bsu016_u:10442: pūrvahetughana tubhya sūdhana pratyutpanna adhimukti niścitā /
S04bsu016_u:10443: mitra sevasi viśeṣaarthikaḥ tena vardhayi jale yathotpalam // 165 //
S04bsu016_u:10449: yādṛśāya adhimuktisaṃpadā vandanaṃ kṛtamidaṃ tvayā mama /
S04bsu016_u:10454: bhadranāma vara carya uttamāṃ tanumantime praveśayiṣyati // 170 //
S04bsu016_u:10455: eva maitraku asaṅgagocaro dṛṣṭa sūdhana guṇaiḥ samudgatam /
S04bsu016_u:10456: darśayitva pariṣāya saṃmukhaṃ varṇakośamimu tasya vyāhari // 171 //
S04bsu016_u:10457: śrutva sūdhana tadānuśāsanīmīdṛśīṃ ca anuśāsti uttamām /
S04bsu016_u:10460: utthihitva sudhanaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ maitra nāma kurute pradakṣiṇam // 173 //
S04bsu016_u:10461: tasya mañjuśiri tena tejasā puṣpahāraratanā ca pāṇiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:10464: sūdhano varaprahṛṣṭamānaso maitrakasya kṣipi tāni harṣitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10465: tasya śīrṣu parimārjate tadā maitranātha sudhanaṃ ca bhāṣate // 175 //
S04bsu016_u:10466: sādhu sādhu jinaputra sūdhana yasya te aparikheda īdṛśaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10467: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇāna bhājanaṃ mañjughoṣu yatha yādṛśo va ham // 176 //
S04bsu016_u:10468: śrutva sūdhana udānudānayi durlabhā bhavaśateṣu īdṛśāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10469: mitra yebhiriha me samāgamaḥ sādu āgamanamadya me iha // 177 //
S04bsu016_u:10471: mitra labdha maya durlabhā ime bhotu me laghu samāgamasvayi // 178 //
S04bsu016_u:10472: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃprasthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10473: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04bsu016_u:10523: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
S04bsu016_u:10530: mahābodhicaryārambhaṃ samāśvāsayati sadevakaṃ lokaṃ na visaṃvadati,
S04bsu016_u:10534: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamupadarśayannevamāha - paśyatha kulaputrā imaṃ śreṣṭhiputram,
S04bsu016_u:10545_1: paryupāsīno mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena saṃpreṣito dhanyākarānnagarādupādāya sarvadakṣiṇāpathamaṭan
S04bsu016_u:10546_4: mahādharmayajñasaṃbhāropacayodyuktānāṃ nāmadheyaśravaṇaṃ vā rūpakāyadarśanaṃ vā gocarasaṃvāso
S04bsu016_u:10548: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sarvajagatparitrāṇāya abhyutthitaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10550_0: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sattvānāṃ caturoghottaraṇatāyai mahādānaṃ mahādharmanāvaṃ
S04bsu016_u:10550_5: mahāśvāsaṃ dātukāmo bhavacārakāvaruddhānāṃ jñānaprahāṇaṃ dātukāmo dṛṣṭibandhanabaddhānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:10551: sa eṣa kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ evaṃ sattvaparitrāṇāya apratiprasrabdho bodhicittotpādaviśuddhiṃ parimārgamāṇo 'yamaparikhinno mahāyānasamudānayāya,
S04bsu016_u:10561: durlabhāḥ kulaputrāste sattvāḥ sarvaloke, ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhati /
S04bsu016_u:10572: na hi kulaputrastāmanye bodhisattvāḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairbodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhiparipūrimadhigamiṣyante buddhabodhau vasanto bhaviṣyanti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau vā,
S04bsu016_u:10583_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūtaguṇavarṇakīrtanaṃ
S04bsu016_u:10583_1: kṛtvā tadārambaṇaṃ ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgāśayaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat
S04bsu016_u:10584: yena te sarvalokahitasukhāya sarvasattvadhātuparitrāṇāya sarvabuddhadharmapratilambhāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
S04bsu016_u:10585: sulabdhāste kulaputra lābhāḥ, svāgataśca tvaṃ manuṣyapratilambhaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10596: tatkasya hetoḥ? bodhicittaṃ hi kulaputra bījabhūtaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇām /
S04bsu016_u:10719: tatkasya hetoḥ? ataḥ prabhavati sarvabodhisattvacaryāmaṇḍalam / ato
S04bsu016_u:10721: tasmāttarhi kulaputra yena anuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
S04bsu016_u:10730: evameva kulaputra sarvajñatācittauṣadhiparigṛhīto bodhisattvo rāgāgninā na dahyate,
S04bsu016_u:10737: evameva bodhicittajñānauṣadhiparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvasaṃsāropakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
S04bsu016_u:10741: tadyathā kulaputra aparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhītaḥ puruṣo 'jayo bhavati sarvaśatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:10742: evameva sarvajñatācittāparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikamaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:10743: tadyathā kulaputra asti vigamo nāma bhaiṣajyam /
S04bsu016_u:10746: tadyathā kulaputra asti sudarśano nāma mahābhaiṣajyarājaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10749: tadyathā kulaputra asti saṃtāno nāma mahābhaiṣajyavṛkṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10750: tasya sahanipātitā tvak sarvavraṇān saṃrohayati, yathotpāṭitāsya tvak saṃbhavati /
S04bsu016_u:10751: evameva bodhisattvabījasaṃbhūtaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃtānavṛkṣaḥ sahadarśanena śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ karmakleśavraṇān saṃrohayati /
S04bsu016_u:10754: yasyāḥ prabhāvena sarvajambudvīpakā [Gv_399] vṛkṣā sarvā vivardhante,
S04bsu016_u:10757: sā yasya śarīragatā bhavati, tasya kāyacittakalyatā jāyate /
S04bsu016_u:10767: evameva bodhicittādṛśyamahauṣadhigṛhīto vyavakīrṇavihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣaye na dṛśyate /
S04bsu016_u:10768: tadyathā kulaputra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnarājaṃ mahāsamudre /
S04bsu016_u:10769: tasya anyalokadhātvasaṃkrāntasya asthānamanavakāśo yanmahāsamudrasya sarvakalpoddāhāgninā śakyaṃ tālamātramapi pariśoṣayitum /
S04bsu016_u:10778: tadyathā kulaputra udakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ kaivarta udake na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:10779: evameva sarvajñatācittodakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnagṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārasāgare na mriyate /
S04bsu016_u:10781: tena sahagate kaivartādayo jalajīvinaḥ sarvanāgabhavanāni praviśanto 'dhṛṣyā bhavanti sarvanāgoragaiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10783: tadyathā kulaputra śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ śakro devarājo sarvadevagaṇānabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:10785: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamahāmaṇiratnagṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvadāridryānna bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:10789: tadyathā kulaputra candrakāntaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ candrābhayā spṛṣṭamudakadhārāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:10791: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājānāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
S04bsu016_u:10793: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra jagadvyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvasattvābhiprāyaparipūraṇatayā na kadācitkṣayamupaiti,
S04bsu016_u:10795: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino mahāmaṇiratnaḥ sa tamondhakāravidhamaṃ gacchati,
S04bsu016_u:10804: tadyathā kulaputra vaiḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ varṣaśatasahasramapi amedhyamadhyagataṃ tiṣṭhat sarvadaurgandhyena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
S04bsu016_u:10806: tadyathā kulaputra ekamāgneyaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu016_u:10807: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādāgneyamahāmaṇiratnaṃ vipaśyanāsaṃprayuktaṃ yoniśo manasikārataḥ sarvamajñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu016_u:10808: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudre potāropitamanardhyeyamaṇiratnaṃ vaṇigghastagataṃ nagarapratiṣṭhāni kācamaṇiśatasahasrāṇyabhibhavati varṇataśca āyataśca,
S04bsu016_u:10810: tadyathāsti vaśirājaṃ nāma maṇiratnaṃ yajjambudvīpagatameva catvāriṃśadyojanasahasrasthitānāṃ candrasūryamaṇḍalānāṃ bhavanavimānapratibhāsavyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:10814: sarve te vaśirājamaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
S04bsu016_u:10817: sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante /
S04bsu016_u:10818: tadyathā kulaputra asti sāgaravyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yatsarvamahāsāgaravyūhān saṃdarśayati,
S04bsu016_u:10820: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇiratnaṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ divyena jāmbūnadasuvarṇena,
S04bsu016_u:10821: evameva sarvajñajñānacintārājamahāmaṇiratnaṃ [Gv_401] sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ bodhicittotpādadivyajāmbūnadasuvarṇena /
S04bsu016_u:10822: tadyathā kulaputra nāgamaṇḍalasiddha āhituṇḍikaḥ sarvanāgoragān vaśe sthāpayati,
S04bsu016_u:10824: tadyathā kulaputra praharaṇagṛhītaḥ śūro durgharṣo bhavati śatrumaṇḍalena,
S04bsu016_u:10825: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvakleśaśatrumaṇḍalena /
S04bsu016_u:10826: tadyathā kulaputra divyoragasāracandanasya ekacūrṇadhāraṇaṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ gandhena spharati,
S04bsu016_u:10827: karṣapramāṇaṃ sarvatrisāhasre lokadhāturatnaparipūrṇena mūlyaṃ na kṣamate,
S04bsu016_u:10830: tadyathā kulaputra himavaccandanaṃ nāma mahācandanaratnaṃ sarvadāhaṃ praśamayati,
S04bsu016_u:10835: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10837: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta sarvajñatāvarṇāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:10838: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya cchavigandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:10839: sa sarvajambudvīpe sarvavārṣikājātisumanādīnāṃ puṣpajātīnāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:10842: tadyathā kulaputra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyaṃ bahūnāṃ puṣpaśatasahasrāṇāmāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
S04bsu016_u:10843: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapāriyātrakavṛkṣasya kuśalamūlaśuṅgībhūtasya veditavyamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sāsravanāsravabodhikusumāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S04bsu016_u:10844: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitasya pāriyātrakusumairvastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:10845: sa divasatasahasraparibhāvitasya campakavārṣikāsumanābhivastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:10846: evameva ya ekajanmaparibhāvitasya sarvajñatācittasaṃtānasya bodhisattvaguṇajñānagandho daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhapādamūleṣu pravāti,
S04bsu016_u:10848: tadyathā kulaputra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā /
S04bsu016_u:10849: sā mūlata upādāya yāvatpuṣpaphalaparyantātsarvakālaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ na kadācinnopajīvyā bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:10850: evameva mahākaruṇāpraṇidhimūlasaṃjāto bodhisattvasya prathamasarvajñatācittotpādo yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyavasānāt sadevakasya lokasya na kadācinnopajīvyo bhavati /
S04bsu016_u:10851: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam /
S04bsu016_u:10853: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyaṃ tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ na lohīkartum /
S04bsu016_u:10854: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni [Gv_402] paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti /
S04bsu016_u:10855: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaṃ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
S04bsu016_u:10856: tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pyagniryāvadupādānaṃ labhate tāvatīṃ jvālāṃ pramuñcati,
S04bsu016_u:10860_0: akṣaya eva pradīpo bhavatyaparyādattaḥ sarvapradīpaniryāṇaiḥ evameva ekasmātsarvajñatācittotpādapradīpādatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
S04bsu016_u:10860_1: sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpānāṃ dīpyamānānāmakṣaya eva sa ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo
S04bsu016_u:10861: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate,
S04bsu016_u:10862: sahapraveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitamapi tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati avabhāsaṃ ca karoti,
S04bsu016_u:10866: tadyathā kulaputra yādṛśī pradīpavartirbhavati tādṛśaṃ pradīpo 'vabhāsaṃ karoti,
S04bsu016_u:10868: evameva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhānavartiviśeṣatā bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:10872: tadyathā kulaputra divyajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāro vaśavartino devarājasya mūrdhnāvabaddho 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvakāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10874: tadyathā kulaputra siṃhasya mṛgarājasya nādena acirajātāḥ siṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti,
S04bsu016_u:10876: evameva tathāgatapuruṣasiṃhasya bodhicittasaṃvarṇanasarvajñatānādena prayuktena sarvādikarmikabodhisattvasiṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti buddhadharmaiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10883: evameva kalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitaḥ karmakleśakṣīramahāsamudraḥ tathāgatamahāpuruṣasiṃhasarvajñatācittotpādadugdhaikabinduprakṣepeṇa sarvo 'navaśeṣaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:10885: tadyathā kulaputra aṇḍakośādanirgatasya kalaviṅkapotasya yo nādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvabalavegasaṃpannānāṃ himavannivāsināṃ sarvapakṣigaṇānāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:10886: evameva yaḥ saṃsārāṇḍakośagatasyādikarmikabodhisattvakalaviṅkapotasya mahākaruṇābodhicittanādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ na saṃvidyate /
S04bsu016_u:10887: tadyathā kulaputra yo 'cirajātasya mahāgaruḍendrapotasya pakṣavātabalaparākramo nayanapariśuddhiguṇaśca,
S04bsu016_u:10888: [Gv_403] sa sarvaśarīrapravṛddhānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ na saṃvidyate,
S04bsu016_u:10891: tadyathā kulaputra mahāpuruṣahastagato nārācaḥ kiyaddṛḍhamapi varma nirbhinatti,
S04bsu016_u:10892: evameva dṛḍhavīryabodhisattvahastagataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādanārācaḥ sarvadṛṣṭyanuśayavarmāṇi nirbhinatti / tadyathā kulaputra
S04bsu016_u:10895: evameva mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāviṣṭasya bodhisattvamahānagnasya yāvadadhyāśayavadane sarvajñatācittotpādapiṭakā na vigacchanti,
S04bsu016_u:10897: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ śikṣitasyeṣvastrāntevāsina iṣvastrajñāne kṛtābhyāsasya śilpasthānayogabalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10899: evameva yaḥ sarvādikarmikasya sarvajñatābhūmyā kṛtābhyāsasya bodhisattvājāneyasya praṇidhijñānādhimukticaryābalaviśeṣaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:10901: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
S04bsu016_u:10902: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya /
S04bsu016_u:10903: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
S04bsu016_u:10904: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya /
S04bsu016_u:10905: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
S04bsu016_u:10907: tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,
S04bsu016_u:10909: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
S04bsu016_u:10911: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
S04bsu016_u:10917: evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,
S04bsu016_u:10918: tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti, na saṃdadhati /
S04bsu016_u:10919: tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
S04bsu016_u:10921: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:10922: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,
S04bsu016_u:10924: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:10927: tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:10931: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
S04bsu016_u:10932: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
S04bsu016_u:10933: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
S04bsu016_u:10935: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
S04bsu016_u:10936: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,
S04bsu016_u:10938: tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
S04bsu016_u:10939: evameva sarvabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānasaṃbhārayogeṣu sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati, na kvacidduṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:10940: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
S04bsu016_u:10942: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:10943: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
S04bsu016_u:10949: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
S04bsu016_u:10951: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:10952: na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
S04bsu016_u:10953: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:10954: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
S04bsu016_u:10955: tadyathā kulaputra [Gv_405] sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
S04bsu016_u:10960: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
S04bsu016_u:10962: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
S04bsu016_u:10964: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,
S04bsu016_u:10968: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
S04bsu016_u:10971: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
S04bsu016_u:10972: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu016_u:10973: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni /
S04bsu016_u:10978: tasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśasaṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate,
S04bsu016_u:10981: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,
S04bsu016_u:10983: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu śobhate,
S04bsu016_u:10989: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
S04bsu016_u:10991: [Gv_406] tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
S04bsu016_u:10995: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
S04bsu016_u:10998: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
S04bsu016_u:11000: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
S04bsu016_u:11001: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
S04bsu016_u:11002: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
S04bsu016_u:11004: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
S04bsu016_u:11006: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,
S04bsu016_u:11008: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
S04bsu016_u:11011: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11012: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
S04bsu016_u:11013: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
S04bsu016_u:11015: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
S04bsu016_u:11016: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
S04bsu016_u:11020: niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
S04bsu016_u:11021_0: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11021_1: paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11021_3: mahādharmameghān saṃdhārayatāṃ te mahākuśalamūlabalādhānavegā nānyena cittena śakyāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11022: iti hi [Gv_407] kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11023: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,
S04bsu016_u:11026: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
S04bsu016_u:11027: api ca kulaputra yadvadasi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu016_u:11030: asya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantaraṃ praviśya vyavalokaya /
S04bsu016_u:11033: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evamāha - vivṛṇu ārya asya kūṭāgārasya dvāram /
S04bsu016_u:11035: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya kūṭāgārasya dvāramūlamupasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā acchaṭāśabdamakārṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11038: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paramāścaryaprāptastatkūṭāgāraṃ prāviśat /
S04bsu016_u:11040_0: so 'drākṣīt taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ bahuyojanaśatasahasravistīrṇaṃ gaganatalāpramāṇaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11045: te cāsya kūṭāgāravyūhā anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyāmaitrībhūtā anyonyāsaṃkīrṇāḥ pratibhāsayogena ābhāsamagaman ekasminnārambaṇe /
S04bsu016_u:11047_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya
S04bsu016_u:11048: samanantarapraṇipatitamātraśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānabalena sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhyantarapraviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11050: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamaṃ praṇidhānacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu016_u:11051_0: yannāmagotropapannena yena kuśalamūlena yayā samādāpanayā yena kalyāṇamitrasaṃcodanena
S04bsu016_u:11051_1: yadāyuḥpramāṇena yannāmake kalpe yatratathāgate yadvyūhe yādṛśyāṃ parṣadi yādṛśena
S04bsu016_u:11054: yāvacca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya ca tathāgatasya tena samayenāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt,
S04bsu016_u:11055: tāvatkāle tasya tathāgatasya pādamulagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11057: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamo maitrasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11058: yata upādāya asya maitreya iti saṃjñodapādi tadadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11067: yathā vyākṛto yena vyākṛto yāvaccireṇa ca vyākṛtastatsarvamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11068: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ cakravartirājabhūtaṃ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11080: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prabhayā mahānarakānavabhāsya narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvanirayaduḥkhaṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11082: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pretabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulamannapānamupasaṃhṛtya kṣutpipāsāṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11083: kvacitkūṭāgāre tiryagyonau vividhopapatyāyatanavimātratayā tiryagyonigatān sattvān vinayantamadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11090: kvacidyāvaddaśabhūmisthitairbodhisattvaiḥ saha maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvabhūmivaiśeṣikatāṃ saṃgāyantamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11102_0: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ nānāvimātratāṃ janmakulavimātratāṃ kāyavyūhāpramāṇavimātratāmāyurvimātratāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11103: madhye ca vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya ekamudārataraṃ vistīrṇataraṃ ca tadanyasarvakūṭāgārāśeṣasarvavyūhātiriktataravyūhasamalaṃkṛtaṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11105: tasmiṃśca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭīśataṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ koṭīśataṃ tuṣitabhavanānāmadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11106: sa tatra jambudvīpeṣu maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ padmagarbhagataṃ jāyamānamapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11107_0: śakrabrahmābhyāṃ pratīkṣyamāṇaṃ saptapadāni prakrāntaṃ daśa diśo vyavalokayamānaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11107_1: mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadantaṃ sarvakumārabhūmiṃ saṃdarśayamānaṃ antaḥpuramadhye gatamudyānabhūmiṃ
S04bsu016_u:11107_3: paribhuñjānaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrāntaṃ māraṃ dharṣayamāṇaṃ bodhiṃ vibudhyamānaṃ bodhivṛkṣamanimiṣaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11109: sarvatra ca tatra sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
S04bsu016_u:11110_1: smṛtyadhiṣṭhānajñānena sarvasaṃjñāgatavyavasitāyāṃ jñānabhūmau sthito yāvanti teṣu
S04bsu016_u:11112_1: bodhicittamutpādayati amukaṃ dharmamukhaṃ śrutvā amukena kalyāṇamitreṇa samādāpito
S04bsu016_u:11112_2: 'mukasya tathāgatasya pādamūle evaṃnāmni kalpe īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛkparṣanmadhyagate
S04bsu016_u:11112_3: īdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlamūlamavaropya īdṛśāṃstathāgataguṇān śrutvā īdṛśenādhyāśayena īdṛśyā
S04bsu016_u:11113: iyataḥ kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritvā iyadbhiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04bsu016_u:11116: tasya parinirvṛtasya iyataḥ kalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati, iyān samartho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu016_u:11117: kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma bodhisattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carannīdṛśāni duṣkaraparityāgaśatāni karoti /
S04bsu016_u:11125: amuko nāma bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataśāsanamabhyudgato dharmabhāṇakatvaṃ karoti,
S04bsu016_u:11135: kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma tathāgata etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
S04bsu016_u:11136: dharmaṃ ca deśayati evaṃnāmnābhiṣekeṇa īdṛśyāṃ parṣadi īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛśe kalpe īdṛśenāyuḥpramāṇena īdṛśyā dharmadeśanayā īdṛśena sattvavinayena īdṛkpraṇidhyabhisaṃbodhena /
S04bsu016_u:11138: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ nirghoṣāṇāṃ śraveṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vipulaprītivegābhiṣyandita cittastāni dharmamukhāni śṛṇoti /
S04bsu016_u:11151: teṣu ca caṃkrameṣu niṣadya svāsaneṣu ca asaṃkhyeyān bodhisattvān nānākāryaprayuktānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11156: mālyadāmapāṇīn chatradhvajapatākāpāṇīn gandhadhūpavilepanapāṇīn vividharatnavicitrasuvarṇasūtrapāṇīn vividhamuktāhārapāṇīn nānāratnahārapāṇīn sarvavyūhaparigṛhītapāṇīn /
S04bsu016_u:11165_0: yaduta strīrūpān puruṣarūpān dārakarūpān dārikārūpān śakrarūpān brahmarūpān lokapālarūpān
S04bsu016_u:11176: teṣu ca sarvaratnāṣṭāpadeṣu maitreyasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhisattvacaryākramamapaśyat yathā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāścaryāmacaran /
S04bsu016_u:11178_11: nadīpathe nāvaṃ vāhayamānaṃ kvacidbālāhāśvarājabhūtaṃ mahāsamudre rākṣasīdvīpagatān
S04bsu016_u:11178_13: daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānaṃ kvacidvaidyabhūtamāturāṇāṃ cikitsāṃ
S04bsu016_u:11178_21: karmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu aṣṭāṅgapoṣadheṣu buddhadharmasaṃghaśaraṇagamaneṣu
S04bsu016_u:11182: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre yāvanti maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrāṇi paryupāsitāni teṣāṃ vikurvitavyūhānadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11183: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalyāṇamitreṣu upasaṃkrāntamābhāṣyamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma - ehi sudhana svāgatam /
S04bsu016_u:11186: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastata ekaikasmātkūṭāgārādekaikasmādārambaṇādimāni ca anyāni ca avicintyavyūhaviṣayavikurvitānyadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11189_0: tadyathā puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato vividhān rūpārambaṇaviśeṣān paśyet yaduta
S04bsu016_u:11190: udyānārāmatapovanaramaṇīyāni vā vṛkṣanadīpuṣkiriṇīparvataramaṇīyāni vā mātāpitṛmitrajñātisālohitasamavadhānagataṃ vā ātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:11191: mahāsamudraṃ vā paśyet sumeruṃ vā parvatarājānaṃ sarvadevabhavanāni vā jambudvīpaṃ vā,
S04bsu016_u:11193: tacca gṛhaṃ vā avacarakaṃ vā vipulaṃ paśyet /
S04bsu016_u:11195: na rātridīrghaṃ ca saṃjānīte na hrasvam, na svapna iti saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:11197: sa prasrabdhakāyasaṃskāro vigatastyānamiddhaḥ sarvaratyapakarṣito vipulaprītisukhasaṃvedī dīrghaṃ ca vipulaṃ ca saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:11198: divasaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ardhamāsaṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā tato vā uttari saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:11202: tadyathā glānaḥ puruṣaścarame cittotpāde vartamāna upapatyānantaryacitte pratyupasthite karmabhave āmukhībhūte yathākṛtakarmopacayavipākena aśubhakarmapratyayena narakaṃ vā paśyet,
S04bsu016_u:11203: tiryagyoniṃ vā pretaviṣayaṃ vā yamapuruṣān vā dṛḍhapraharaṇagṛhītān ruṣitānākrośato ruditākrośitaśabdaṃ ca nārakāṇāṃ śruṇuyāt /
S04bsu016_u:11217: tadāyuḥkālaṃ ca saṃjānīyāt - itaścyutastatra vopapanno 'nantarhita eva karmaviṣayācintyatayā etāṃ kriyāṃ paśyet saṃjānīta anubhavet /
S04bsu016_u:11219: tadyathā bhūtagrahāviṣṭaḥ puruṣo vividhāni rupagatāni paśyati /
S04bsu016_u:11221: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhānabalena tān sarvavyūhānadrākṣīt /
S04bsu016_u:11222: tadyathā nāgabhavanapraviṣṭaḥ puruṣo nāgasaṃjñāgatapraveśena divasaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ardhamāsaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃjānīte,
S04bsu016_u:11224: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvasaṃjñāgatānusmṛtabuddhistanmaitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānavaśena tanmuhūrtaṃ bahūni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu016_u:11227_0: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tān sarvān vyūhānanyonyāsaṃkīrṇān sarvārambaṇeṣu
S04bsu016_u:11227_2: vā caṃkrame vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā yathākṛtsnasamāpattiviṣayāvatāreṇa
S04bsu016_u:11228: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tān sarvān vyūhān yathāviṣayāvatāreṇa paśyati saṃjānīte /
S04bsu016_u:11231: tadyathā yakṣavimānapraviṣṭāni manuṣyavimānāni yakṣavimānāntargatānyanyonyāsaṃbhinnāni yathākāmaviṣayapariśuddhyā saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:11232: tadyathā mahāsamudre sarvasya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ pratibhāsasamudrāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu016_u:11233: tadyathā māyākāro mantravidyauṣadhibalādhiṣṭhānena sarvarūpagatāni sarvakriyāśca saṃpaśyati /
S04bsu016_u:11235: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvastatkūṭāgāraṃ praviśya tadadhiṣṭhānamavasṛjya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā etadavocata - uttiṣṭha kulaputra /
S04bsu016_u:11239: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tenācchaṭāśabdena tataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11240: taṃ maitreyo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭā te kulaputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānavikurvāḥ?
S04bsu016_u:11250: api tu khalu ārya ko nāmaiṣa vimokṣaḥ?
S04bsu016_u:11251: maitreya āha - sarvatryadhvārambaṇajñānapraveśāsaṃmoṣasmṛtivyūhagarbho nāma kulaputra eṣa vimokṣaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11253: sudhana āha - kva asau ārya vyūho gataḥ? maitreyo bodhisattva āha - yata evāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11254: sudhana āha - kuta āgataḥ? maitreyo bodhisattva āha - bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhānābhinirhārādāgataḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11256: na kvacidgato nāgato na rāśībhūto na saṃcayabhūto na kūṭastho na bhāvastho na bhāvasthito na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11257: tadyathā kulaputra nāgānāṃ meghajālaṃ na kāyena cittena abhyantarībhūtaṃ na saṃcayasthitaṃ na saṃdṛśyate /
S04bsu016_u:11259: evameva kulaputra te vyūhā nādhyātmagatā na bahirdhāgatā na ca na saṃdṛśyante,
S04bsu016_u:11262: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya sarvamāyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya māyā na kutaścidāgacchanti na vigacchanti na kvacitsaṃkrāntim,
S04bsu016_u:11264: evameva kulaputrate vyūhā na kvacidgatā na kutaścidāgatā na kvacidrāśībhūtāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11286: ahamasmin kulaputra āgacchāmi janmabhūmermāladebhyo janapadebhyaḥ kuṭigrāmakāt /
S04bsu016_u:11288: taṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya janmabhūmakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ yathābhājanatayā dharmaṃ deśayitvā mātāpitṛjñātisaṃbandhinaśca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn mahāyāne samādāpya /
S04bsu016_u:11289: sudhana āha - katamā ārya bodhisattvānāṃ janmabhūmiḥ?
S04bsu016_u:11291: katamā daśa? yaduta bodhicittotpādo bodhisattvānāṃ janmabhūmiḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11317: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisattvo 'tikrānto bhavati bālapṛthagjanabhūmim /
S04bsu016_u:11326: adoṣaḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām /
S04bsu016_u:11328: evaṃ kulajātisamṛddhāśca kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ pratibhāsāyatanasarvadharmaparijñātatvānna vijugupsante sarvalokopapattiṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11342_2: paripācanārthaṃ jambudvīpe ca janmopapattisaṃdarśanārthamiha dakṣiṇāpathe māladeṣu
S04bsu016_u:11343: so 'haṃ kulaputra iha dakṣiṇāpathe anenopāyena yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāvineyānāṃ paripākavinayaṃ kurvan ihaiva vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhe kūṭāgāre [Gv_418] prativasāmi /
S04bsu016_u:11344: itaścāhaṃ cyutaḥ tuṣitabhavane upapattiṃ saṃdarśayiṣyāmi yathāśaye sattvānuvartanatāyai,
S04bsu016_u:11354: bodhiprāptaṃ ca māṃ kulaputra tvaṃ punarapi drakṣyasi sārdhaṃ mañjuśriyā kalyāṇamitreṇa //

S04bsu016_u:11402_1: gatvā atiṣṭhat mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ cintayan anuvilokayan mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya

S04bsu016_u:11403_1: sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra
S04bsu016_u:11404: eṣa nayaḥ eṣa gocaraḥ eṣa vihāro jñātuṃ vā avagāhayituṃ vā avatarituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā kalpayituṃ vā pratyavagantuṃ vā pratilabdhuṃ vā iti //

S04bsu016_u:11405_2: kṛtvā samantabhadracaryāmaṇḍale 'vatārayitvā svadeśe ca pratiṣṭhāpya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ // 53 //

S04bsu016_u:11434: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurabhavan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya darśanāya //

S04bsu016_u:11444: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvatathāgatakāyapratibhāsamaṇiratnavigrahameghā niścaritvā daśasu dikṣu sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /

S04bsu016_u:11448_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka imān daśa pūrvanimittāvabhāsān dṛṣṭvā samantabhadrasya
S04bsu016_u:11448_12: samanvāgato 'drākṣīt samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu016_u:11448_13: samyaksaṃbuddhasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudragataṃ
S04bsu016_u:11450: sa tasya kāyāt sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān prabhāmaṇḍalameghānniścaritvā nānāvarṇān sarvabodhisattvānudāraprītiprāmodyavegān vivardhayamānānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11451: mūrdhatoṃ 'sakūṭābhyāṃ sarvaromavivarebhyaśca nānāvarṇān gandhārcimeghānniścārya sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalāni spharitvā abhipravarṣamāṇānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11458: sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromavivarātsarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān rūpadhātudevanikāyameghānniścārya bodhisattvaṃ saṃvarṇayataḥ sarvalokadhātuṃ spharamāṇānapaśyat /

S04bsu016_u:11472_0: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya idamṛddhiviṣayavikurvitaṃ

S04bsu016_u:11478: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparā adrākṣīt,
S04bsu016_u:11479_0: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ
S04bsu016_u:11480: yathā ca samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇamadrākṣīt etadvikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānam,
S04bsu016_u:11481: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhagavato bhadraśriyastathāgatasya padmaśriyāṃ lokadhātāvetadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /

S04bsu016_u:11486: evaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatapādamūleṣu mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /

S04bsu016_u:11491: sa tadacintyaṃ samantabhadramahābodhisattvavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca daśa jñānapāramitāvihārān pratyalabhata /
S04bsu016_u:11503: tasyaivaṃ jñānapāramitāvihārasamanvāgatasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadrao bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:11504: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mūrdhni pāṇiḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11515: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagataḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya murdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
S04bsu016_u:11516: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:11517_1: sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya
S04bsu016_u:11518: yathā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagatena samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena pāṇinā spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
S04bsu016_u:11520: evaṃ sarvasamantabhadrātmabhāvaprasṛtaiḥ pāṇimeghaiḥ spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya dharmamukhānyavakrāntānyabhūvan nānānayaiḥ //
S04bsu016_u:11521: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra mama vikurvitam? āha - dṛṣṭamārya /
S04bsu016_u:11522: api tu tathāgataḥ prajānan prajānīyāttāvadacintyamidaṃ vikurvitam /
S04bsu016_u:11523: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān vicaritaḥ sarvajñatācittamabhilaṣamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11525: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe sarvatyāgasamāyuktāḥ sarvalokavighuṣṭā mahāyajñā yaṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11544: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe 'nabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ parameśvarabhūtena satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11546: teṣāṃ ca asmiṃstathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā sarvabuddhānuśāsanīṣu pratipannaḥ śāsanaṃ ca me teṣāṃ saṃdhāritam //
S04bsu016_u:11547: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tāvadbhiḥ kalpasamudrerekacittotpādamapi tathāgaśāsane vilopamutpādayituṃ nābhijānāmi /
S04bsu016_u:11548_1: vā ātmagrahaparigrahacittaṃ vā ātmaparanānātvacittaṃ vā bodhimārgavipravāsacittaṃ
S04bsu016_u:11548_2: vā saṃsārasaṃvāsaparikhedacittaṃ vā avalīnacittaṃ vā āvaraṇasaṃmohacittaṃ vā utpādayitumanyatra
S04bsu016_u:11549: iti hi kulaputra sarvakalpasāgarāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuḥ tānnirdiśato ye mama pūrvayogasaṃbuddhakṣetrapariśuddhiprayogāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11555: tāvadbhyo me kulaputra dharmasamudrebhyo na kiṃcidekapadavyañjanamapi yanna cakravartirājyaparityāgena krītam,
S04bsu016_u:11558_0: tena mayā kulaputra anena evaṃrūpeṇa saṃbhārabalena mūlahetūpacayabalena udārādhimuktibalena
S04bsu016_u:11561: nāhaṃ kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇapathamapyāgacchāmi prāgeva darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:11563: ye mama nāmadheyaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /

S04bsu016_u:11571_0: kecidardhamāsaṃ kecinmāsaṃ kecidvarṣaṃ kecidvarṣaśataṃ kecitkalpaṃ kecitkalpaśataṃ
S04bsu016_u:11579: iti hi kulaputra buddhākṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairupāyaiḥ sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu016_u:11580: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā mama buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu016_u:11582: ye mamātmabhāvapariśuddhiṃ paśyanti, te mamātmabhāve upapadyante /
S04bsu016_u:11584: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyannadrākṣīt ekaikasmin romavivare 'nabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrasāgarān buddhotpādaparipūrṇān /
S04bsu016_u:11586: sarvāṃśca tān kṣetrasāgarān nānāpratiṣṭhānān nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvyūhān nānācakravālān nānāmeghagaganasaṃchannān nānābuddhotpādān nānādharmacakranirghoṣānapaśyat /
S04bsu016_u:11588: tathā anavaśeṣataḥ sarvaromavivareṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11589_1: daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūn spharitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyakaṃbodhau sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
S04bsu016_u:11590: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvāvavādānuśāsanyanuśiṣṭaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvakāyāntargateṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvavatīrya sattvān paripācayāmāsa /
S04bsu016_u:11591: ye ca khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamakalyāṇamitropasaṃkramadarśanaparyupāsanajñānālokakuśalamūlopacayāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11592: te samantabhadrabodhisattvasahadarśanena kuśalamūlopacayasya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayānti,
S04bsu016_u:11594: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamante saprathamacittotpādāya yāvatsamantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanam /
S04bsu016_u:11597_1: pareṇa aparāntakoṭīgatakalpādhiṣṭhānalokadhātuṃ pareṇa vikrameṇa paryantaṃ nopajagāma /
S04bsu016_u:11602: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe ca anantamadhyān kṣetrasāgarānavatarati sma,
S04bsu016_u:11606_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparaṃparānabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
S04bsu016_u:11606_1: kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotayamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
S04bsu016_u:11607: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11608: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
S04bsu016_u:11615: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
S04bsu016_u:11617: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
S04bsu016_u:11620: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:11622: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
S04bsu016_u:11623: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam // 8 //
S04bsu016_u:11624: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
S04bsu016_u:11625: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
S04bsu016_u:11626: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11627: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
S04bsu016_u:11632: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
S04bsu016_u:11633: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
S04bsu016_u:11634: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
S04bsu016_u:11635: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11637: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11638: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
S04bsu016_u:11639: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
S04bsu016_u:11640: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
S04bsu016_u:11644: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
S04bsu016_u:11645: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet /
S04bsu016_u:11647: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //
S04bsu016_u:11648: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
S04bsu016_u:11649: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
S04bsu016_u:11650: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11651: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
S04bsu016_u:11653: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //
S04bsu016_u:11654: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
S04bsu016_u:11655: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
S04bsu016_u:11656: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11657: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
S04bsu016_u:11658: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
S04bsu016_u:11659: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
S04bsu016_u:11661: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
S04bsu016_u:11663: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11665: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
S04bsu016_u:11666: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
S04bsu016_u:11673: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
S04bsu016_u:11674: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
S04bsu016_u:11675: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
S04bsu016_u:11676: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
S04bsu016_u:11680: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
S04bsu016_u:11681: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
S04bsu016_u:11693: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
S04bsu016_u:11695: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11696: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
S04bsu016_u:11698: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //
S04bsu016_u:11700: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
S04bsu016_u:11701: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
S04bsu016_u:11702: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
S04bsu016_u:11703: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:11704: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
S04bsu016_u:11705: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
S04bsu016_u:11706: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
S04bsu016_u:11709: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11710: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //
S04bsu016_u:11712: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
S04bsu016_u:11713: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
S04bsu016_u:11714: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
S04bsu016_u:11715: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
S04bsu016_u:11716: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11718: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
S04bsu016_u:11719: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
S04bsu016_u:11720: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
S04bsu016_u:11721: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
S04bsu016_u:11722: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
S04bsu016_u:11723: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
S04bsu016_u:11725: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
S04bsu016_u:11726: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
S04bsu016_u:11727: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
S04bsu016_u:11729: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
S04bsu016_u:11730: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
S04bsu016_u:11731: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /
S04bsu016_u:11732: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
S04bsu016_u:11734: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
S04bsu016_u:11735: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
S04bsu016_u:11736: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
S04bsu016_u:11743: te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ,
S04bsu016_u:11746: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
S04bsu016_u:11748: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tethāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu016_u:11749: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
